source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You are come at a good time. As you may have heard, we have something of a quandary on our hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu ne pouvais pas mieux tomber. Nous avons un ennui, mais tu es pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment déjà au courant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Laxan Loft, here in Lakeland. Eulmore has sent one of its airships.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eulmore a envoyé un aéronef. Il a franchi la frontière de Grand-Lac il y a peu et stationne ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment près du château de Ganlag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They have questions for us concerning the death of the Lightwarden. Their emissary makes his way here even as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Les Eulmoriens veulent nous questionner au sujet de la mort du grand purgateur. Ils nous ont fait savoir que leur envoyé arriverait sous peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000040_ALISAIE<tab>I suppose the sky does rather give the game away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000040_ALISAIE<tab>Vu comme la nuit s'est abattue sur la région en un instant, nous aurons bien du mal à nier la disparition du monstre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed. 'Twas inevitable they would come knocking. The only question was how soon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En effet. Ils s'en seraient évidemment aperçus tôt ou tard, mais leur réaction me prend quelque peu de court.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000060_LYNA<tab>My lord. I am come with the Eulmoran emissary. May I show him in?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000060_LYNA<tab>Exarque, l'envoyé d'Eulmore est arrivé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>A moment, Captain, if you would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Très bien, fais-le patienter un instant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Everyone, gather round.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Approchez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I do not wish to show our hand prematurely. Forgive me this liberty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je ne veux pas leur révéler ma carte maîtresse tout de suite. Vous me pardonnerez donc l'usage de cette petite ruse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vanish!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Disparition<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Enter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Entrez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Well, well... The commander of the Eulmoran Army himself. To what do I owe the honor, General Ran'jit?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sire Ran'jit. Je ne pensais pas qu'Eulmore nous honorerait de la présence de son grand général.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000130_RANJIT<tab>The Lightwarden is dead, Exarch. Were your people responsible?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000130_RANJIT<tab>Réponds-moi, Exarque. Est-ce l'un des tiens qui a abattu le grand purgateur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You are clearly in some haste, my lord. But before I address your question, you must allow me one of my own. What is Eulmore's interest in this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pardonnez-moi, Général, mais vous me prenez au dépourvu. Pour tout vous dire, je comprends à peine le sens de votre question.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000150_RANJIT<tab>His Benevolence Lord Vauthry is gravely concerned that the actions of an ignorant few may jeopardize relations between man and sin eater.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000150_RANJIT<tab>Mon maître craint que les actions de quelque inconscient n'aient envenimé les relations entre humains et purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000160_RANJIT<tab>Should it transpire that the Crystarium is guilty of abetting the villains responsible for this outrage...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000160_RANJIT<tab>Cristarium commettrait donc un acte de trahison en abritant les coupables de cette infamie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000170_RANJIT<tab>My lord has decreed that it suffer the same...retribution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000170_RANJIT<tab>Il va sans dire que notre armée n'aurait alors d'autre choix que de marcher sur cette cité. Telle est la volonté de don Vauthry.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I see. Since you have been so candid, I too shall speak my mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vous êtes allé droit au but, alors permettez-moi d'en faire de même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Regardless of who is responsible, the Crystarium <var 1A 02 /var>rejoices<var 1A 01 /var> in the Lightwarden's death, and welcomes the return of the night sky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Peu importe nos liens avec les res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles de cet “incident”, nous nous réjouissons de pouvoir à nouveau admirer le ciel tel qu'il est censé être.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If Eulmore considers this tantamount to aiding those you term “villains,” then by all means carry out your retribution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Si ce simple fait vous déplaît, libre à vous de donner l'assaut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Know, however, that even should every innocent soul in the Crystarium perish, nothing can stop that which has been set in motion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mais sachez une chose... Le destin est en marche, et vous ne pourrez l'arrêter, même en exécutant les habitants de Cristarium jusqu'au dernier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000220_RANJIT<tab><sigh> Folly. The death of one or a thousand thousand sin eaters changes nothing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000220_RANJIT<tab>Tant de naïveté... Vous aurez beau exterminer les purgateurs par milliers, le calvaire ne cessera jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000230_RANJIT<tab>The world is dead, and writhe as we might, like maggots in its rotting corse, it will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be reborn. Only by my master's grace may we live out our days in peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000230_RANJIT<tab>Nous vivons sur la carcasse d'un monde décrépit. Don Vauthry est le seul à pouvoir adoucir cette peine, en nous offrant un peu de paix et de bonheur avant l'inéluctable fin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000240_RANJIT<tab>But I waste my breath. You have made your stance clear. I shall relay your words to Lord Vauthry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000240_RANJIT<tab>Mais ta réponse est on ne peut plus claire, et je la transmettrai à mon maître.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000250_RANJIT<tab>In the meantime, you would do well to counsel any here who have done more than merely “rejoice” in recent events to throw themselves upon Eulmore's mercy. Promptly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000250_RANJIT<tab>De ton côté, assure-toi que chaque habitant de Cristarium sache qu'il sera bientôt trop tard pour se rendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000260_RANJIT<tab>One last matter. We are searching for a young artist and his assistant. Know you of whom I speak?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000260_RANJIT<tab>Une dernière chose... Un jeune peintre et son aide auraient récemment franchi vos portes. Aurais-tu des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions les concernant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>An artist and his assistant... No. I cannot say I do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Navré... cela ne me dit rien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000280_RANJIT<tab>What a pity. Should they <var 1A 02 /var>reveal<var 1A 01 /var> themselves to you, I bid you hand them over at once. My master is most eager to <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var> them again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000280_RANJIT<tab>Voilà qui est déplorable... Vous devrez nous les remettre, si jamais vous les trouvez. Mon maître... brûle d'impatience de les revoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000290_ALISAIE<tab>Am I imagining things, or did he just stare straight at us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000290_ALISAIE<tab>Vous êtes sûr que nous étions entièrement invisibles<var 1D /var>!? On aurait dit qu'il nous fixait des yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I fear he did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, ce n'est peut-être pas que votre imagination...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The general is not a man to be trifled with. He is a warrior of fearsome repute who has led Eulmore's army since before Vauthry's time, when the nation still spearheaded the fight against the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Avant que Vauthry n'accède au pouvoir et impose de cohabiter avec les purgateurs, Eulmore prônait au contraire leur extermination, et engageait ses troupes dans ce combat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>One does not command the world's mightiest army, and for so long, without possessing exceptional instincts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le général Ran'jit était à la tête de ces expéditions. Il est resté un guerrier hors pair, et son armée est toujours la plus puissante de ce monde. Ses années d'expérience lui confèrent pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment une acuité supérieure à la moyenne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000330_ALPHINAUD<tab>If Eulmore chose to send such an individual, we must assume this talk of retribution is more than an idle threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vauthry ne nous aurait pas envoyé son bras droit s'il n'avait pas l'intention de mettre ses menaces à exécution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>While we are grateful for your support, my lord─we cannot in good conscience put your people in harm's way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous sommes re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sants pour votre accueil, Exarque. Mais nous ne saurions rester plus longtemps, si notre présence constitue un danger pour les habitants de Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis noble of you to say, Master Alphinaud, but my people have been in harm's way since long before you arrived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Votre sollicitude vous honore, mais je préférerais que vous me laissiez en décider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eulmore has ever yearned to rule over what remains of the world. Even should we surrender the Warrior of Darkness to them, they would find some other pretext upon which to invade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En outre, le but avoué de Vauthry est de conquérir tous les territoires restants. Même si nous lui livrons <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière des Ténèbres)) ((le Guerrier des Ténèbres)) /var> sur un plateau d'argent, il inventera une autre raison pour prendre la cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The people of the Crystarium know this only too well, which is why, when the time comes, I am certain they will fight to the last man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ceux qui vivent ici ne sont pas dupes non plus. Qui plus est, ils ont survécu aux plus grands malheurs sans jamais abandonner leur fierté, et ce n'est pas aujourd'hui que cela changera.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000380_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If truth be told, I would not have been surprised had Ran'jit declared war here and now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000380_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À dire vrai, connaissant la puissance de l'armée eulmorienne et le caractère de Vauthry, leur retenue me laisse dubitatif...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000390_LYNA<tab>He may have reason to delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000390_LYNA<tab>Maintenant que j'y pense, ils voulaient peut-être gagner du temps, eux aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000400_LYNA<tab>According to reports, the Eulmoran forces at Laxan Loft were observed taking a prisoner.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000400_LYNA<tab>D'après nos sentinelles, les soldats eulmoriens ont organisé des battues dès leur arrivée au château de Ganlag. Et ils seraient parvenus à capturer la personne qu'ils cherchaient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000410_LYNA<tab>A young woman believed to be none other than the Oracle of Light─Minfilia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000410_LYNA<tab>On sait qu'elle s'appelle Minfilia. Il s'agit sûrement de la prêtresse de la Lumière qui leur avait échappé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000420_LYNA<tab>It may be that General Ran'jit wishes to convey her to Eulmore before commencing hostilities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000420_LYNA<tab>Le général veut sûrement la rapatrier à Eulmore avant d'ouvrir les hostilités. Ça ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>que<var 16 /var>rait pourquoi il a si gentiment tourné les talons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000430_LYNA<tab>Having mentored generations of Minfilias, it would not surprise me if he had made her capture his chief concern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000430_LYNA<tab>Tout le monde sait à quel point il tient à ses Minfilia...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wait, is this <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> Minfilia?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>? Notre Minfilia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm sorry, “generations of Minfilias”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>“Ses” Minfilia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, of course. How remiss of me. I had intended to speak to you of Minfilia. There is, however, much to say, and precious little time in which to say it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'oubliais, c'est vrai que tu n'es pas au courant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I think it best that you seek out Moren at the Cabinet of Curiosity. He will be able to enlighten you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Moren pourra éclairer ta lanterne à ce sujet. Je te suggère de lui adresser tes questions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alphinaud, Alisaie─would you care to accompany your friend? You doubtless have insights of your own to offer on the matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alphinaud, Alisaie, accompagnez-<var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var>, je vous prie. Vous ne serez pas de trop pour lui expliquer cette histoire compliquée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000470_ALISAIE<tab>All right. Though I'm still not sure I understand it all myself...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000470_ALISAIE<tab>D'accord. Je ne suis pas sûre d'avoir moi-même tout compris, mais on fera de notre mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the meantime, I will set about making provisions for war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pendant que vous serez occupés, j'essaierai d'en apprendre plus sur ce qui se trame du côté d'Eulmore. Je pourrai ainsi mieux répondre à cette tentative d'intimidation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You are doubtless eager to attempt Minfilia's rescue─and with your combined strength, you may well succeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je pense sincèrement que des combattants aussi habiles que vous seraient capables de libérer Minfilia, même si vous deviez affronter l'armée eulmorienne tout entière pour y parvenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But as I said earlier, I do not wish to show our hand unless absolutely necessary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mais n'oubliez pas, vous êtes un atout que je préférerais garder caché.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Twas not merely the night sky that you restored to us, but hope─hope for the future of Norvrandt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vous nous avez offert bien plus qu'un ciel étoilé. Vous nous avez montré que Norvrandt avait un avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Unlike you, we cannot contend with the Lightwardens. But so long as hope burns in our hearts, we will fight on regardless. This I will prove to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pour nous, terrasser un grand purgateur relève de l'impossible. Mais tant que la flamme de l'espoir brûlera, nous ferons toujours face à l'adversité. Et je vais vous le prouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friends, I thank you for gathering at such short notice. There is something I would ask you all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Excusez-moi de vous avoir dérangés, mais je souhaitais soulever un problème qui nous concerne tous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As many of you are aware, I received an emissary from Eulmore a short while ago─in the form of General Ran'jit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Certains d'entre vous savent sûrement déjà qu'un re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tant d'Eulmore, le général Ran'jit, m'a rendu visite tout à l'heure.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To my dismay, the general condemned the slaying of the Lightwarden, and warned me in no uncertain terms that, should the Crystarium cast its lot with the Warrior of Darkness, there would be war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il m'a annoncé de but en blanc que si Cristarium décidait de soutenir <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres, la cité paierait le prix fort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let none be mistaken: we would be hard-pressed indeed to resist the might of Eulmore. Some would even call it suicide.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quelle qu'en soit l'issue, nous ne sortirions pas indemnes d'une guerre frontale avec Eulmore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And yet my heart cries out to fight. Better that than relinquish the hope that swelled in my breast when I beheld the night sky for the first time in a hundred years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quand bien même... je refuse que cette vision d'un ciel limpide soit condamnée à rester un souvenir centenaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Or so says my heart. My mind, meanwhile, reminds me that to follow my heart would be to risk everything we have accomplished thus far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bien sûr, je suis conscient des risques. Devrais-je m'engager dans cette voie, il me serait alors impossible de faire machine arrière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Clearly, this is not a decision to be made lightly─nor less alone. And so I put the question to you all. What should we do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Voilà pourquoi je souhaiterais bénéficier de votre conseil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000600_GLYNARD<tab>My lord, you already know our minds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000600_GLYNARD<tab>Voyons, Exarque. Ne nous convoquez pas alors que vous connaissez déjà notre sentiment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000610_GLYNARD<tab>It brought tears to our eyes to witness the night's return. The whole of Norvrandt deserves the same, and not just because some children's story tells us so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000610_GLYNARD<tab>Nous avons tous été émus aux larmes en découvrant ce ciel. <var 08 E905 ((Guerrière)) ((Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres ou pas, tel est le paysage que nous voulons admirer pour le restant de nos jours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000620_BRAGI<tab>Eulmore's influence is far-reaching. Should war break out, trade would be subject to restrictions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000620_BRAGI<tab>Si nous nous opposons à la volonté de Vauthry, la vie deviendra encore plus dure qu'elle l'est déjà. Eulmore est la plaque tournante du négoce...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000630_BRAGI<tab>The flow of goods will dry up, and we will struggle to make do with what little trickles through... But make do we will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000630_BRAGI<tab>Les échanges commerciaux cesseront presque entièrement, et notre étalage en pâtira. Après, ça en vaut peut-être la chandelle, je sais pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000640_KATLISS<tab>Aye, we can weather such hardships! Is that not the very thing the Crystarium was built for?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000640_KATLISS<tab>Allons, allons<var 1D /var>! On aura de quoi tenir un moment<var 1D /var>! La débrouille, ça nous connaît.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000650_KATLISS<tab>We have always taken pride in our ability to sustain ourselves─not just to endure, but to thrive!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000650_KATLISS<tab>Notre persévérance fait la fierté de Cristarium. De ce qu'on dit, c'est la seule qualité que l'exarque a requis des premiers colons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000660_MOREN<tab>"When all falls down around you, rise up.“ Those were your words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000660_MOREN<tab>Je me souviens de l'histoire. Vous leur auriez dit<var 1D /var>: “Le moment venu, j'aurai besoin de vous à mes côtés...”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000670_MOREN<tab>"There may come a day when all hope seems lost. But even should the rest of the world give in to despair─we shall not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000670_MOREN<tab>“Un jour, le malheur deviendra notre pain quotidien et les gens se résigneront à leur sort. Quand cela arrivera, les habitants de cette cité devront au contraire garder la tête haute.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000680_MOREN<tab>"We shall fight on, that our children and our children's children might know a better tomorrow.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000680_MOREN<tab>“Nous partirons à la conquête d'un avenir radieux pour que la mémoire de ceux qui nous ont quittés ne tombe pas dans l'oubli.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000690_CASSARD<tab>Rousing words apart, I never much cared for those Eulmoran bastards anyway. No better than common swindlers, most of them. Wouldn't know a fair deal if it came up and kissed them on the arse!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000690_CASSARD<tab>De toute façon, on n'a jamais pu les piffer, ces enfoirés d'Eulmoriens<var 1D /var>! Ils essaient toujours de nous la faire à l'envers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000700_GLYNARD<tab>Trust you to spoil the moment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000700_GLYNARD<tab>Ah ben bravo<var 1D /var>! Toujours aussi classe, à ce que je vois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000701_CASSARD<tab>(BIG LAUGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000701_CASSARD<tab>(rire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It appears we have a consensus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le temps est venu de montrer la force de notre résolution<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let it be known that the Eulmoran host at Laxan Loft has taken the Oracle of Light captive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Des troupes eulmoriennes ont pris position au château de Ganlag, et nous avons appris que la prêtresse de la Lumière avait été capturée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They fear the power she holds over the sin eaters, and doubtless intend to imprison her once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Puisque son pouvoir lui permet de lutter contre les purgateurs, vous pouvez être certains qu'elle sera à nouveau emprisonnée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So I move that we rescue the Oracle, grant her a place among us, and let <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> be our answer to Eulmore's ultimatum!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ce même pouvoir en ferait une alliée de choix dans notre combat. Voilà pourquoi je propose que nous aidions <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres à l'arracher des griffes d'Eulmore<var 1D /var>! Qu'en dites-vous, mes amis<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000750_KATLISS<tab>Hear, hear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000750_KATLISS<tab>J'approuve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000760_CASSARD<tab>Hear, hear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000760_CASSARD<tab>Pareil pour moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000770_LYNA<tab>In planning a strategy for the rescue, I open the floor to you all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000770_LYNA<tab>Comment chacun de vous compte-t-il apporter son aide<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And there you have it. If Eulmore wishes to denounce us as villains, then we shall embrace our villainy. Will you do so as well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Et voilà, nous sommes désormais tous des rebelles. Souhaitez-vous vous joindre à nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hum...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will not be outdone. Consider us your partners in crime.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>On peut dire que vous ne faites pas dans la dentelle, et vos concitoyens non plus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000810_LYNA<tab>My lord, our proposal is as follows: we begin by deploying amaro to occupy the skies over Lakeland. They should serve to delay the airship's departure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000810_LYNA<tab>Exarque, nous avons un plan. Que diriez-vous de bloquer les voies aériennes de Grand-Lac à dos d'amaros<var 1D /var>? Cela permettrait de retarder l'appareillage de l'aéronef d'Eulmore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000820_LYNA<tab>At the same time, we scatter dream powder from the air.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000820_LYNA<tab>De plus, nous pourrions utiliser la poudre de rêve préparée par nos artisans et la répandre sur nos ennemis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000830_LYNA<tab>Not all will succumb to its effects, but it should thin the enemy's numbers, affording us an opening to swoop in and liberate the Oracle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000830_LYNA<tab>Ils ne tomberaient pas tous en léthargie, mais leurs forces s'en retrouveraient amoindries. Ensuite, nous profiterions de cette opportunité pour secourir la prêtresse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Very good. See to your preparations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Très bien. Nous suivrons ce plan. Que chacun se prépare.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000850_ALISAIE<tab>And what exciting crimes would you have <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> commit? Speaking for my fellow villains, I'd say we're capable of most things─though we draw the line at indolence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000850_ALISAIE<tab>J'espère que vous nous avez gardé un rôle excitant. Je vous rappelle que nous faisons partie de vos rebelles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If excitement is your desire, then I bid you join the guard. Captain Lyna will give you your orders.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À ce compte-là, joignez-vous à nos soldats. Lyna vous expliquera ce qu'elle attend de vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000870_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>Keep moving!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000870_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>Pourquoi tu t'arrêtes<var 1D /var>!? Allez, avance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000880_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>Eh? What now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000880_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>C'est quoi ce boucan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000890_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>The Crystarium at a guess.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000890_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>Ça doit être les habitants de Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000900_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>Desperate fools. It'll take more than a handful of overgrown lizards to ground us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000900_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>Je parie qu'ils veulent nous empêcher d'appareiller, ça leur ressemblerait bien. Ces abrutis ont rien dû trouver de mieux pour nous gêner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000910_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>Oh, you've got to be─ Sound the alarum!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000910_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>Qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>!? Faut prévenir les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000920_CRYSTARIUMGARDPICKET<tab>Captain, the powder has taken effect!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000920_CRYSTARIUMGARDPICKET<tab>Capitaine<var 1D /var>! Tout se déroule comme prévu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000930_LYNA<tab>It is time. Let us free the Oracle from their clutches!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000930_LYNA<tab>Ça va être à nous de jouer. Nous allons prendre d'assaut le château et délivrer la prêtresse de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000940_RANJIT<tab>You, boy. You bear a striking resemblance to the artist my master seeks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000940_RANJIT<tab>Tiens tiens... Ton ami ressemble étrangement au peintre que nous cherchons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000950_RANJIT<tab>By all means, keep your counsel. You will all have ample time to confess your crimes back in Eulmore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000950_RANJIT<tab>Je découvrirai la vérité bien assez tôt. Et vous aurez tout le temps de regretter vos actions quand je vous aurai enfermés dans la même cage que Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000960_THANCRED<tab>(CHARGING ATTACK)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000960_THANCRED<tab>(Porte un puissant coup d'épée)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000970_RANJIT<tab>(PARRYING ATTACK)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000970_RANJIT<tab>Hmpf...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000980_THANCRED<tab>(REELING FROM BLOW)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000980_THANCRED<tab>(Résiste tant bien que mal)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000990_RYNE<tab>Thancred?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_000990_RYNE<tab>Thancred...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001000_RANJIT<tab>So! <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> are the wretch who stole her from us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001000_RANJIT<tab>Toi<var 1D /var>!? Tu es le sale rat qui m'a dérobé Minfilia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001010_THANCRED<tab>And what if I am!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001010_THANCRED<tab>Ça te pose un problème<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001020_THANCRED<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001020_THANCRED<tab>Quoi...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001021_THANCRED<tab>(REELING FROM BLOW)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001021_THANCRED<tab>(se fait repousser)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001030_RANJIT<tab>Pathetic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001030_RANJIT<tab>Tu es faible... si faible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001040_RANJIT<tab>Vermin such as you are not worthy of the Oracle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001040_RANJIT<tab>Un avorton comme toi n'est pas digne de la prêtresse de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Break!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fossile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001060_RANJIT<tab>Fool! You would see your city razed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001060_RANJIT<tab>Pauvre fou... Réalises-tu que tu viens de signer l'ané<var 16 /var>an<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment de ta précieuse cité<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I would sooner see it razed than conquered. Suffice it to say, we are ready to receive you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eulmore n'a pas attendu notre in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion pour en décider, j'en suis sûr. Qui plus est, j'agis en toute con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de cause.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001080_RANJIT<tab>What now, Exarch? Will you face me yourself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001080_RANJIT<tab>Et maintenant, que comptes-tu faire, Exarque<var 1D /var>? M'affronter en combat singulier, peut-être<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I think not, General. I've quite exhausted my tricks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Non. Mon déphaseur spatial ne peut être réutilisé, et je ne me sens pas la force d'incanter un second sort d'immobilisation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If you mean to give chase, I will not stand in your way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Lancez-vous à leur poursuite si ça vous chante, je ne suis pas en mesure de vous retenir plus longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But you would do well to tread warily. For your quarry goes to a place where even Eulmore dare not bare its steel...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Néanmoins, sachez ceci. Là où ils sont partis, ni vous ni moi ne pourrons les suivre sans déployer les grands moyens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il Mheg, the faerie kingdom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le peuple féérique ne laisse pas entrer n'importe qui en Il Mheg, voyez-vous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001130_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)To think that mountain of indolence still had the energy to unleash his hounds...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001130_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)(soupire)... Et moi qui croyais Vauthry trop indolent pour mobiliser son armée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001140_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Even the most pointless of conflicts may alter a world's course... And now the plan has gone awry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001140_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Tout sera à refaire si une guerre éclate à cause de ces cha<var 16 /var>mail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ries.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001150_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)But how...? How did the so-called Crystal Exarch bring the hero of the Source to the First?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001150_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)L'exarque du Cristal... Comment s'est-il débrouillé pour faire venir <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var> du monde primitif<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001160_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)As if I didn't have enough on my hands already...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001160_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Ici aussi, nous allons devoir nous coltiner <var 08 E905 ((cette empêcheuse)) ((cet empêcheur)) /var> de tourner en rond<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001170_EMETSELCH<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001170_EMETSELCH<tab>(soupire)...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001180_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Then again...with a soul such as that...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001180_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Et comme si ça ne suffisait pas, la porteuse de cette âme l'accompagne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001190_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Mayhap there is another way. One which does not require bloodshed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001190_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Hum, qui sait<var 1D /var>? Ce revirement de situation pourrait nous offrir une alternative à l'af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Not so long ago, here in the shadow of the northern ranges, lay the great Kingdom of Voeburt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Autrefois, le royaume de Voeburt s'étendait d'un escarpement à l'autre des inaccueillantes montagnes du Nord.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>A nation with a proud history...that the sin eaters cut short. Just like all the rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Mais même cette civilisation ancestrale avait été reléguée au passé par les attaques incessantes des purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Since that time, these lands have become a haven for fae folk.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Elle avait laissé sa place à d'autres, au peuple féérique et à son pays enchanteur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dreamers frolicking amidst the ruins of a forgotten realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ici, ces rêveurs batifolaient au milieu des ruines centenaires...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001240_THANCRED<tab>We should be safe enough here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001240_THANCRED<tab>Bien... on a assez marché. Si nous avions des poursuivants, on les a cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment déjà semés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001250_THANCRED<tab>It's good to see you again, my friends. I don't know about you, but it feels like <var 1A 02 /var>years<var 1A 01 /var> since last we met. Five of them, in my case.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001250_THANCRED<tab>Vous m'avez tellement manqué<var 1D /var>! Je ne sais pas pour vous, mais en ce qui me concerne, notre dernière rencontre remonte à cinq ans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001260_ALISAIE<tab>Why, it only feels like <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> to me. But long enough to warrant a more convivial reunion, either way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001260_ALISAIE<tab>Je m'étais imaginé des retrouvailles moins mouvementées, mais tu as bien choisi ton moment pour faire ton apparition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001270_ALISAIE<tab>What brought you to Laxan Loft?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001270_ALISAIE<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu faisais dans les parages, d'ailleurs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001280_THANCRED<tab>The girl, Minfilia. She and I were traveling together, hunting sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001280_THANCRED<tab>J'étais là-bas pour elle... pour Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001290_THANCRED<tab>But as we were nearing Lakeland, she abruptly ran off on her own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001290_THANCRED<tab>Nous avons passé un moment à voyager ensemble tout en chassant les purgateurs. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, elle a décidé de me fausser compagnie alors que nous approchions de Grand-Lac.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001300_THANCRED<tab>I found her too late to stop the Eulmorans from taking her prisoner. And as I was considering rescue options, I observed that the Crystarium was on the move.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001300_THANCRED<tab>En essayant de retrouver sa trace, j'ai appris qu'elle avait été capturée par l'armée eulmorienne. Je réfléchissais à un moyen de la sortir de ce guêpier quand j'ai remarqué de l'agitation près de Cristarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001310_THANCRED<tab>So I consulted the Exarch, who apprised me of the details of the operation─and issued me certain instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001310_THANCRED<tab>J'ai couru à toute allure pour demander ce qui se passait à l'exarque. Il m'a expliqué votre plan, et j'en ai profité pour lui suggérer une échappatoire, au cas où.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001320_THANCRED<tab>Should the situation take a turn for the worse, I was to see you all safely to Il Mheg. And here we are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001320_THANCRED<tab>Comme les choses ont tourné au vinaigre, nous avons procédé comme convenu. Il a ouvert un passage vers l'Il Mheg quand nous avons été acculés et je me suis joint à vous pour vous servir de guide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger has called this place home for a while now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>L'Il Mheg... C'est ici qu'Urianger s'est installé, si ma mémoire est bonne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yet we have never called upon him, I am ashamed to say. 'Twas only at the Crystarium that we met.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001340_ALPHINAUD<tab>En revanche, je ne sais pas où exactement. C'est toujours lui qui nous retrouve à Cristarium quand nous devons discuter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001350_THANCRED<tab>Hardly surprising. This is not the sort of place one visits on a whim.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001350_THANCRED<tab>Ça ne m'étonne pas. Peu d'humains peuvent se vanter d'avoir mis les pieds dans ces lieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001360_THANCRED<tab>Happily, having trespassed on Urianger's hospitality for a spell, Minfilia and I have an idea of how things work around here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001360_THANCRED<tab>Mais rassurez-vous. Minfilia et moi avons déjà été accueillis ici par Urianger. Nous en savons un peu plus que le commun des mortels sur l'endroit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001370_THANCRED<tab>Sooner or later, the Eulmorans will come after us. But before they do, the Exarch bids us accomplish two things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001370_THANCRED<tab>Les soldats d'Eulmore ne tarderont pas à nous rattraper. L'exarque du Cristal nous a confié deux tâches à remplir avant leur arrivée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001380_THANCRED<tab>First, rendezvous with Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001380_THANCRED<tab>Premièrement, nous devons prendre contact avec Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001390_THANCRED<tab>And second, eliminate the Lightwarden of this land.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001390_THANCRED<tab>Et deuxièmement, nous devons abattre le grand purgateur qui se cache dans cette région.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001400_ALISAIE<tab>So...Minfilia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001400_ALISAIE<tab>Minfilia, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Je peux t'appeler Minfilia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001410_ALISAIE<tab>What made you leave Thancred behind─if you don't mind me asking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001410_ALISAIE<tab>Dis, pourquoi tu es partie comme ça, sans rien dire à Thancred<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001420_RYNE<tab>You. The hero from another world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001420_RYNE<tab>C'est vous que je cherchais... Vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> qui vient du même monde que Thancred.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001430_RYNE<tab>I was asleep when I felt it. A presence. Someone I was meant to meet. They were close, and...and I knew I had to go to them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001430_RYNE<tab>Depuis un moment, quand je dors, j'ai cette sensation étrange... Comme si la personne que je devais rencontrer était enfin arrivée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001440_RYNE<tab>But with all the commotion in Lakeland, I was afraid that Thancred wouldn't...let me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001440_RYNE<tab>Thancred disait que c'était dangereux de se rapprocher trop près de Grand-Lac à cause des soldats qui venaient d'arriver. Mais je pensais qu'avec vous, on pourrait les arrêter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001450_THANCRED<tab>And would I have been wrong? Had I arrived a moment later, you would be back in your cell in Eulmore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001450_THANCRED<tab>Et au final, ils t'ont mis le grappin dessus<var 1D /var>! Tu as de la chance qu'on ne soit pas arrivés quelques minutes plus tard<var 1D /var>! Tu réalises qu'ils t'auraient ramenée dans ta cage à Eulmore<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001460_THANCRED<tab>And now we have Ran'jit snapping at our heels! You really have outdone yourself this time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001460_THANCRED<tab>En plus, Ran'jit en personne les commande<var 1D /var>! Tu...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001470_RYNE<tab>I'm sorry. Thank you for saving me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001470_RYNE<tab>Pardon... Merci d'être venu à mon secours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001480_YSIALA<tab>(-???-)Awww, poor thing, being scolded so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001480_YSIALA<tab>(-Voix d'enfant-)Oh... La pauvre... Elle s'est fait gronder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001490_SULUIN<tab>Poor thing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001490_SULUIN<tab>Regardez-la<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001500_OULSIGUN<tab>Poor, poor thing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001500_OULSIGUN<tab>Elle est toute triste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001510_ALISAIE<tab>Who said that? Show yourselves!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001510_ALISAIE<tab>D-d'où viennent ces voix<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001520_SULUIN<tab>(-???-)Come now, put away that frown and have some fun with us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001520_SULUIN<tab>(-Voix d'enfant-)Faut pas faire cette tête<var 1D /var>! Venez jouer avec nous, n'ayez pas peur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001530_YSIALA<tab>Yes, let's have some fun!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001530_YSIALA<tab>Venez<var 1D /var>! On va s'amuser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001540_OULSIGUN<tab>Lots and lots of fun!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001540_OULSIGUN<tab>Allez<var 1D /var>! Allez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001550_THANCRED<tab>Ugh, which way was it to Urianger's?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001550_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia... Dis-moi que tu te souviens comment on va chez Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001560_RYNE<tab>We've been there so many times, but I'm not... I can't...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001560_RYNE<tab>J-j'ai oublié<var 1D /var>! Comment c'est possible<var 1D /var>!? Je connaissais le chemin par cœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001570_RYNE<tab>Why can't I remember?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001570_RYNE<tab>Pourquoi je n'arrive pas à m'en souvenir<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001580_THANCRED<tab>Damn it all. We're already caught in their spell!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001580_THANCRED<tab>On est déjà sous l'emprise de leur magie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001590_SULUIN<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001590_SULUIN<tab>Hi hi hi hi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001600_YSIALA<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001600_YSIALA<tab>Hé hé hé hé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001610_OULSIGUN<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001610_OULSIGUN<tab>Ha ha ha ha...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001620_THANCRED<tab>[I've found you. The game is over.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001620_THANCRED<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Je vous ai trouvées, fini de jouer.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001630_SULUIN<tab>Nooo, we are found! How did this mortal know our trick!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001630_SULUIN<tab>Oh, bah<var 1D /var>! Il a gagné... En tout cas, ça faisait longtemps qu'on avait pas vu un humain qui connaît le truc pour nous trouver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001640_YSIALA<tab>Wait, I recognize their souls! These two have been here before!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001640_YSIALA<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>! Hé<var 1D /var>! Elle est pas déjà venue celle-là<var 1D /var>? Ses deux âmes me disent quelque chose<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001650_OULSIGUN<tab>Look, look─twins! How adorable!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001650_OULSIGUN<tab>Regardez<var 1D /var>! Regardez<var 1D /var>! C'est des jumeaux<var 1D /var>! La chance qu'on a<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001660_YSIALA<tab>Awww!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001660_YSIALA<tab>Ils sont trop mignons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001670_OULSIGUN<tab>Play with us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001670_OULSIGUN<tab>V'nez<var 1D /var>! On va jouer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001680_THANCRED<tab>We have neither the time nor inclination to play. We have come to see Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001680_THANCRED<tab>Désolé, mais on n'a pas vraiment le temps, là. On cherche Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001690_SULUIN<tab>Ohhh yes, Urianger! The peculiar one!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001690_SULUIN<tab>Urianger<var 1D /var>! C'est l'humain rigolo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001700_SULUIN<tab>In return for a place in Il Mheg, he agreed to a riddle contest with us! For seven days and seven nights! Without any sleep! Ahahahahahaha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001700_SULUIN<tab>Il voulait habiter en Il Mheg<var 1D /var>! On lui a dit qu'il pouvait rester vivre chez nous, mais seulement s'il trouvait la solution de notre énigme<var 1D /var>! Ça a duré sept jours et sept nuits<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001710_OULSIGUN<tab>Ah, that was so much fun! We <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> do it again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001710_OULSIGUN<tab>Je m'en souviens<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qu'on s'était bien amusés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001720_THANCRED<tab>I'm sure he'd be delighted. Now, if you'd be so kind as to lift your spell...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001720_THANCRED<tab>Sept jours et sept nuits<var 1D /var>? Pas de doute, c'est bien lui. Si vous pouviez nous débarrasser de votre charme de confusion, maintenant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001730_SULUIN<tab>Shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001730_SULUIN<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'on fait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001740_YSIALA<tab>Should we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001740_YSIALA<tab>Chais pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001750_OULSIGUN<tab>Would we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001750_OULSIGUN<tab>Hmmmm...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001760_ALISAIE<tab>What now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001760_ALISAIE<tab>On est vraiment à leur merci, Thancred<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001770_THANCRED<tab>I don't know. But this is their home, so we must indulge them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001770_THANCRED<tab>Que veux-tu que je te dise... Leur territoire, leur loi. On n'y peut rien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001780_SULUIN<tab>Right, we've made up our minds! We will lift our spell on one condition: that you first lend us a helping hand! Or two. Or three!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001780_SULUIN<tab>Notre décision est prise<var 1D /var>! On veut bien rompre le charme, mais en échange, vous devrez nous aider<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001790_SULUIN<tab>Once you've helped solve all of our troubles, we'll let you see Urianger. Pixie's honor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001790_SULUIN<tab>Une fois que vous aurez réglé tous nos petits problèmes, on vous laissera voir Urianger, promis juré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001800_THANCRED<tab>Well, there you have it. Pixie chores. I suggest we split up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001800_THANCRED<tab>(soupire)... On n'a pas vraiment le choix. Séparons-nous, histoire que ça ne prenne pas cent sept ans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001810_FEOUL<tab>Grrr...unnngh... You...you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001810_FEOUL<tab>Grrr... Grrr... Grrrrr...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001820_FEOUL<tab>You're late! Late, late, late!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001820_FEOUL<tab>Tu sais depuis combien de temps j'attends<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001830_FEOUL<tab>I've been waiting for you to summon me ever since you came here! Waiting and waiting and waiting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001830_FEOUL<tab>Je pensais que tu m'appellerais dès que tu mettrais les pieds ici<var 1D /var>! Mais non<var 1D /var>! Tu m'avais com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment oubliée, en fait, hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001840_FEOUL<tab>But my sapling didn't so much as utter my name! Such a heartless thing <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is! Cold and cruel and <var 1A 02 /var>heartless<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001840_FEOUL<tab>Je croyais que t'étais mon petit arbrisseau<var 1D /var>! En fait, t'en as rien à faire de moi, c'est ça, hein<var 1D /var>!? Hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001850_ALISAIE<tab>Another self-important little brat. Just what we need.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001850_ALISAIE<tab>On peut savoir pour qui elle se prend, celle-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hmm. Reminds me of my childhood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Notre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> a dû nouer un pacte avec cette adorable Pixie. Elle me rappelle un peu toi, quand nous étions petits.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001870_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alright, I'm sorry! It was a joke! Honestly, just a joke!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001870_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aouf<var 1D /var>! Alisaie<var 1D /var>!? Qu'est-ce qui te prend<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001880_FEOUL<tab>But just now, you called for me so earnestly, so fervently... I couldn't possibly stay angry at you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001880_FEOUL<tab>Haaa... Bon... J'ai bien aimé quand tu m'as suppliée, tout à l'heure. On va dire que ça compense le reste...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001890_FEOUL<tab>Very well! As your lovely branch, I will lend you my strength!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001890_FEOUL<tab>Allez<var 1D /var>! Que deviendrait un petit arbrisseau sans sa jolie branchette<var 1D /var>!? Laisse-moi faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001900_SULUIN<tab>Well well well! If it isn't Feo Ul, the [Madbloom]! It's been too, too long!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001900_SULUIN<tab>Oh, c'est Feo <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Fleuribonde<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Salut, ça faisait longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001910_FEOUL<tab>Not long enough for you to think of any new games, though, apparently! If I were you, I'd be <var 1A 02 /var>bored<var 1A 01 /var> of myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001910_FEOUL<tab>Vous n'en avez pas marre de faire tourner les humains en bourrique<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001920_FEOUL<tab>Now, let me make something clear: that mortal is <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var>! No matter what you do, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> will <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> be yours. Never, never, <var 1A 02 /var>ever<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001920_FEOUL<tab><var 08 E905 ((Celle-là)) ((Celui-là)) /var>, c'est <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> mien<var 08 E905 ((ne)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! On a noué un pacte, alors <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> peut rester autant qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> veut en Il Mheg sans que vous l'embêtiez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001930_YSIALA<tab>Awww, not even a bit? But...what about the others? Surely we can keep them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001930_YSIALA<tab>On peut pas jouer un peu avec<var 1D /var>? Même avec ses amis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001940_FEOUL<tab>No, no, no! You can't keep them either! They're for <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> amusement, and mine alone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001940_FEOUL<tab>Non, c'est non<var 1D /var>! Vous devez pas les embêter<var 1D /var>! C'est que j'ai hâte de voir de quoi ils sont capables, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001950_FEOUL<tab>And if you lay so much as a finger on my sapling, I'll scatter the contents of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> bag all over your precious village!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001950_FEOUL<tab>Et faites attention, j'ai vu ce qu'il y avait dans ses sacoches. Si vous ne m'écoutez pas, je déverse tout sur votre joli petit village<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001960_FEOUL<tab>There'll be cold, hard metal! Furry, festering food! Stinky, sweaty smallclothes! And...and all manner of other terrible, unmentionable things! How would you like that, hmm!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001960_FEOUL<tab>Les bidules en fer, les trucs en bois, les machins qui pourrissent depuis on ne sait combien de temps<var 1D /var>! Laissez-moi vous dire que ça vous ferait un sacré ménage à faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001970_OULSIGUN<tab>All right, all right... But will you not at least let us play with the twins? Just while the others go and see Urianger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001970_OULSIGUN<tab>D'accord, Feo... Mais laisse-nous au moins nous amuser avec les jumeaux pendant que les autres vont voir Urianger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001980_SULUIN<tab>Aye, aye, that's all we ask! And we promise we'll play nicely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001980_SULUIN<tab>Bonne idée. Si les jumeaux promettent de jouer avec nous, on lève notre envoûtement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001990_ALPHINAUD<tab>...It seems we won't be joining you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_001990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je doute qu'on négocie de meilleures conditions. Partez sans nous. Nous attendrons votre retour ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002000_YSIALA<tab>Aye, haha! We'll reveal the hidden [truth] to you at once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002000_YSIALA<tab>Youpi<var 1D /var>!!! C'est promis, alors<var 1D /var>! Et comme vous êtes gentils, on va vous laisser voir la <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>réalité<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002010_ALISAIE<tab>So this is the true Il Mheg...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002010_ALISAIE<tab>Waouh... Alors c'est ça, l'Il Mheg...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002020_THANCRED<tab>How are you feeling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002020_THANCRED<tab>Ça va, Minfilia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002030_RYNE<tab>Better. I think I remember the way now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002030_RYNE<tab>Je crois que oui. J'ai les idées claires, maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002040_THANCRED<tab>Apologies for the delay. Shall we go and see Urianger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002040_THANCRED<tab>Désolé pour le retard, mais ça devrait aller maintenant que Minfilia et moi pouvons vous guider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002050_FEOUL<tab>Your lovely branch is useful, yes? So whenever you're in trouble, you must remember to <var 1A 02 /var>make use of me<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002050_FEOUL<tab>Hé hé hé... Qu'est-ce que tu aurais fait sans ta jolie branchette<var 1D /var>? La prochaine fois que tu seras dans le pétrin, tu penseras tout de suite à moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002060_THANCRED<tab>Urianger! Are you in?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002060_THANCRED<tab>Urianger<var 1D /var>? Allez, montre-toi. Je sais que tu es là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002070_URIANGER<tab>Unto a world weary of heroes, a hero wends <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002070_URIANGER<tab>(-Voix familière-)Vos pieds foulent enfin les terres de ce monde privé de héros...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002080_URIANGER<tab>The Exarch did send word that thou wouldst seek me out, but ne'er did I imagine thou wouldst arrive so soon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002080_URIANGER<tab>(-Voix familière-)L'exarque du Cristal avait dit que vous me rendriez visite, mais vous avez fait plus vite que je ne l'aurais cru.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002090_URIANGER<tab>Full glad am I to see thee once more, my friend, and none the worse for thy travails.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002090_URIANGER<tab>Notre dernière rencontre remonte à bien trop loin. Mais je suis heureux de voir que le temps n'a pas eu prise sur vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002100_THANCRED<tab>Run along, Minfilia. We will meet you outside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002100_THANCRED<tab>Tu vas devoir nous laisser, Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002110_RYNE<tab>But...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002110_RYNE<tab>Mais, pourquoi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002120_THANCRED<tab>Another one for you to imbue, if you'd be so kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002120_THANCRED<tab>Prends ces cartouches, et insuffles-y de l'éther, comme d'habitude. Je peux compter sur toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002130_URIANGER<tab>I take it thou hast met with our other comrades already?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002130_URIANGER<tab>Avez-vous pu rencontrer les autres Héritiers<var 1D /var>? Dites-moi tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002140_URIANGER<tab>Hmm. That Master Alphinaud and Mistress Alisaie now travel in thy company is of great comfort to me. As for the rest...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002140_URIANGER<tab>Voilà donc les cir<var 16 /var>cons<var 16 /var>tan<var 16 /var>ces qui vous ont conduits jusqu'à moi. Et vous dites que les jumeaux Leveilleur vous ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnent<var 1D /var>? Je vois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002150_URIANGER<tab>It beginneth in earnest... The hunting of the Lightwardens, and perforce the war with Eulmore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002150_URIANGER<tab>Je ne pensais pas que les hostilités étaient engagées à ce point, que ce soit avec Eulmore ou avec les grands purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002160_URIANGER<tab>Hark thee, then, to my words, and through them behold the vision that I did glimpse─that of the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002160_URIANGER<tab>Dans ce cas, à mon tour de vous raconter mon histoire. Je commencerai depuis le début, par ma traversée de l'interstice entre les mondes et ce que j'y ai vu... le huitième fléau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002170_URIANGER<tab>As I drifted hither to the First, traversing the boundary 'twixt reality and potentiality, I did bear witness to events yet to come...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002170_URIANGER<tab>Après que l'exarque du Cristal m'a appelé dans le premier reflet, je me suis retrouvé dans cet endroit où ni l'espace ni le temps n'ont cours. C'est là que j'ai eu cette vision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002180_URIANGER<tab>There I saw the combined forces of Eorzea and the Far East offering fierce resistance to the legions of Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002180_URIANGER<tab>Un terrible af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment faisait rage dans le monde primitif. Il opposait Garlemald aux forces combinées de l'Alliance éorzéenne et de la coalition orientale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002190_URIANGER<tab>So fierce, in fact, that they did begin to push the enemy back. Ilm by painful ilm, at first, then yalm by yalm, and malm by malm in time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002190_URIANGER<tab>Dans ce futur, chaque Héritier avait répondu à l'appel. Et nos forces commençaient à prendre le dessus, non sans grandes difficultés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002200_URIANGER<tab>Yet the joy they felt was short-lived, for in so doing, they did force the Empire's hand. Faced with defeat, the Garleans turned to a weapon most vile─Black Rose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002200_URIANGER<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, sentant le vent tourner, l'Empire décida d'abandonner toute raison et de recourir à son gaz délétère, la rose noire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002210_URIANGER<tab>Its potency defied all reckoning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002210_URIANGER<tab>Leur arme secrète se révéla toutefois bien plus meurtrière qu'ils ne l'avaient imaginé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002220_URIANGER<tab>Once released, the gas took on a life of its own, wreaking untold carnage not only in Eorzea, but in the provinces of the Empire besides.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002220_URIANGER<tab>Sa puissance était si grande qu'elle dévasta non seulement Éorzéa, mais aussi Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002230_URIANGER<tab>From fighters upon the front lines to babes in their beds, none were spared. And as the casualties became too numerous to count, so did the fabric of civilization begin to unravel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002230_URIANGER<tab>Le gaz n'épargna personne<var 1D /var>: ni les soldats, ni les chefs de notre alliance, ni même les pauvres innocents qui habitaient près de la frontière. L'hécatombe fit trembler le monde entier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002240_URIANGER<tab>Nor did the land itself escape unscathed. For spreading from the site of its release, Black Rose brought death to the very soil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002240_URIANGER<tab>La rose noire eut toutefois un effet secondaire, encore plus pervers, qui se propagea depuis l'épicentre du drame.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002250_URIANGER<tab>To survive amidst the chaos and upheaval, men came to live by the sword, the rule of law giving way, inevitably, to the rule of might.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002250_URIANGER<tab>Le chaos qu'elle sema dénatura l'environnement et aliéna le reste de la population, ce qui poussa nombre de gens à prendre les armes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002260_URIANGER<tab>Thus was the spark struck and the fire kindled, and swiftly did it spread, as a blaze in a field of straw, to engulf every corner of the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002260_URIANGER<tab>Cet événement propagea le conflit à toutes les autres régions, telle une étincelle embrasant un champ de feuilles mortes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002270_URIANGER<tab>Nations worthy of the name did then cease to exist. And those souls brave and true, who might have risen to restore order...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002270_URIANGER<tab>La nation à blâmer pour cette tragédie était à genoux, incapable de réagir. Quant à la seule personne assez brave pour redresser ces torts...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002280_URIANGER<tab>...were no more. For the weapon spared not one. Not even thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002280_URIANGER<tab>Elle n'était plus... fauchée à son tour par cette arme mortifère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002290_URIANGER<tab>An endless age of war, begotten by the blight of Black Rose... Such is the legacy of the Eighth Umbral Calamity which I did behold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002290_URIANGER<tab>Voilà la forme que prenait le huitième fléau dans ma vision, celle d'une guerre sans fin causée par la rose noire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002300_URIANGER<tab>No matter the cost, we must forestall this tragedy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002300_URIANGER<tab>Nous devons faire tout ce qui est en notre pouvoir pour éviter cette tragédie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002310_URIANGER<tab>To that end, I have labored during my sojourn in this world, discovering in so doing the answer to a pressing mystery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002310_URIANGER<tab>Je n'ai cessé d'œuvrer à cette fin depuis mon arrivée dans le premier reflet, et j'ai fait une découverte capitale qui nous aidera à changer notre destin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002320_URIANGER<tab>That of Black Rose's inexplicable potency.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002320_URIANGER<tab>Dans ma vision, l'effet de la rose noire était anormalement puissant, mais je sais désormais pourquoi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002330_URIANGER<tab>Come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002330_URIANGER<tab>Suivez-moi, je vais vous montrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002340_URIANGER<tab>Dost thou recognize yonder chart?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002340_URIANGER<tab>Savez-vous ce que cela représente<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's a chart of the elements.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Les relations entre les différents éléments<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's...something to do with magic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je dirais que ça concerne la magie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002350_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. 'Tis a rendering of the elemental wheel, such as one might find in classrooms across the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002350_URIANGER<tab>Tout à fait. Il s'agit du diagramme des six éléments, un outil in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble pour tout éthérologue ou spécialiste de la magie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002360_URIANGER<tab>As the chart maketh plain, our world is composed of six elements, in addition to which there exist two poles in fundamental opposition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002360_URIANGER<tab>Notre monde se compose de ces six éléments qui sont transcendés par deux énergies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002370_URIANGER<tab>Astral, the active; umbral, the passive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002370_URIANGER<tab>L'énergie astrale, qui représente le changement, l'ef<var 16 /var>fer<var 16 /var>ves<var 16 /var>cence, et l'énergie ombrale, qui représente la stagnation, le calme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002380_URIANGER<tab>As a reflection of the Source, the First naturally compriseth the selfsame forces, yet curiously, there is a notable divergence in their nomenclature. To be specific, the denizens of this world employ not the terms astral and umbral.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002380_URIANGER<tab>Comme le premier reflet et le monde primitif ne faisaient autrefois qu'un, on peut donc penser que les deux obéissent aux mêmes lois. Pourtant, personne ici ne parle de ces deux énergies transcendantales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002390_URIANGER<tab>Thus was I moved to inquire what names said forces had been assigned. A simple question which yielded a most unexpected answer...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002390_URIANGER<tab>En fait, elles existent ici aussi, mais sont connues sous des noms différents. C'est là que réside la clef du mystère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002400_URIANGER<tab>Upon demanding the name of the pole aligned with activity and growth, I was told that as life's myriad colors combine to produce black, the people of the First had called it “Darkness.” At this did my mind begin to race.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002400_URIANGER<tab>La puissance astrale encourage l'évolution et l'essor. Ici, les gens assimilent cette idée au mélange de multiples couleurs sur une toile de peintre donnant du noir. Voilà ce qu'ils appellent les Ténèbres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002410_URIANGER<tab>Yet 'twas only when I asked what name had been given to the pole aligned with passivity that mine eyes were opened to the truth. Peace and tranquility being as purest white unmarred by color, I was told, it had been given the name of “Light.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002410_URIANGER<tab>À l'inverse, la puissance ombrale qui mène au calme et à la stagnation est associée à une toile vierge de couleurs, au blanc. Autrement dit, à la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002420_THANCRED<tab>That's umbral light and astral darkness, yes? ...I'm no aetherologist, but it strikes me that the nomenclature of the First is rooted in the generation of the two forces, while our own appears to focus on their effects. Which makes one wonder...have we had it backwards all this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002420_THANCRED<tab>C'était peut-être les mots utilisés à l'origine. Les Asciens parlaient des Ténèbres comme la source de leur puissance, et leur civilisation est bien plus ancienne que la nôtre. Si ça se trouve, ce sont même eux qui ont baptisé ces énergies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002430_URIANGER<tab>'Tis indeed a compelling question, and one which beareth closer examination. Yet what knowledge we already possess sufficeth to explain the chain of events.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002430_URIANGER<tab>Cette idée m'a permis de mieux interpréter les événements survenus dans le monde primitif peu avant que nous le quittions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002440_URIANGER<tab>The phenomenon of aetheric thinning observed in the Source is the consequence of Light─the power of stasis─flowing in from the First to stifle the movement of aether within the land.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002440_URIANGER<tab>La Lumière du premier reflet a commencé à se déverser dans le monde primitif. Son pouvoir de stagnation a ralenti les cycles naturels et a entraîné un peu partout l'appauvrissement de l'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002450_URIANGER<tab>And according to Master Alphinaud, Black Rose slayeth by halting the circulation of aether within living beings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002450_URIANGER<tab>D'après les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions d'Alphinaud, la rose noire fonctionnerait selon un principe similaire, en inhibant les flux d'énergie éthérée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002460_URIANGER<tab>Should such a weapon be unleashed even as the First were rejoined, replete as it is with Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002460_URIANGER<tab>Imaginez les con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces, si le premier reflet et son surplus de Lumière venaient à fusionner avec le monde primitif... Surtout si la rose noire était employée sur le champ de bataille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002470_THANCRED<tab>...We would have a disaster of untold proportions on our hands. A calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002470_THANCRED<tab>Le résultat serait catastrophique. La puissance du gaz serait démultipliée, provoquant ainsi un nouveau fléau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002480_THANCRED<tab>Well...at least we have a better grasp of what we're facing. Our objective, however, remains unchanged.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002480_THANCRED<tab>On peut toujours compter sur l'intellect d'Urianger pour éclaircir les mystères les plus complexes. En conclusion, notre plan ne change pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002490_THANCRED<tab>We are to eliminate the Lightwarden of Il Mheg.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002490_THANCRED<tab>Sa vision ne doit pas se réaliser, et pour ça, nous devons commencer par abattre le grand purgateur qui se cache en Il Mheg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002500_THANCRED<tab>Speaking of which, were you able to ascertain its whereabouts?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002500_THANCRED<tab>En parlant de ça, tu as essayé de le traquer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002510_URIANGER<tab>Aye. 'Tis all but certainly ensconced within Lyhe Ghiah, the castle which standeth in the midst of the lake.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002510_URIANGER<tab>Mes recherches m'ont appris qu'il est emprisonné dans Lyhe Ghiah, le château qui surplombe le lac.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002520_URIANGER<tab>To enter said stronghold, we must needs turn to the pixies for aid. Fortunately, I have become quite adept at courting their cooperation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002520_URIANGER<tab>Vous devrez requérir l'assistance du peuple féérique, car leurs charmes de protection scellent l'entrée. Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je pense avoir un plan pour les convaincre de vous aider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002530_URIANGER<tab>Henceforth shall I accompany you, and do all in my power to ensure that my vision doth not come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002530_URIANGER<tab>Permettez-moi de me joindre à vous. Je suis prêt à tout pour que ma terrible prémonition ne devienne jamais réalité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002540_URIANGER<tab>'Tis done. The pixies shall be well pleased with these gifts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002540_URIANGER<tab>Et voilà<var 1D /var>! Les cadeaux pour les Pixies sont prêts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002550_URIANGER<tab>Ah, lest I forget...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002550_URIANGER<tab>Ah, j'allais oublier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002560_URIANGER<tab>White auracite, newly forged for thy use.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002560_URIANGER<tab>C'est une auralithe blanche, capable de piéger l'âme d'un Ascien. Je l'ai créée moi-même après mon arrivée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002570_URIANGER<tab>Our mission being to thwart a Rejoining, we will most assuredly cross paths with those who crave the contrary. Our eternal enemies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002570_URIANGER<tab>J'ai pensé que nous serions tôt ou tard amenés à les combattre, puisque nous cherchons à éviter un nouveau fléau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002580_URIANGER<tab>Thus did I choose to abide in this aether-rich land, the better to fashion a trap for the Ascians' essence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002580_URIANGER<tab>Cet environnement gorgé d'éther s'est révélé très pratique lors de la synthèse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002590_RYNE<tab>May I come in now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002590_RYNE<tab>Euh... Je peux entrer...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002600_THANCRED<tab>You may indeed─assuming you've finished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002600_THANCRED<tab>Oui. Tu as fait ce que je t'avais demandé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002610_RYNE<tab>I did as you asked.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002610_RYNE<tab>Heu... oui, comme d'habitude.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002620_THANCRED<tab>That's my girl. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002620_THANCRED<tab>Merci. C'est gentil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002630_THANCRED<tab>I should probably explain. Though my body remained behind in the Source, its limitations saw fit to accompany me. Which is to say, I cannot manipulate aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002630_THANCRED<tab>Je m'occuperais bien de ça moi-même, mais mes petits soucis d'éther m'ont poursuivi jusqu'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002640_THANCRED<tab>I took up the gunblade for its defensive advantages, but on account of my little impairment, I cannot imbue the ammunition myself. Luckily for me, Minfilia has quite a talent for it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002640_THANCRED<tab>La pistolame est l'arme idéale pour la protection rapprochée. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, ça demande de pouvoir insuffler de l'éther dans les munitions, et comme j'en suis désormais incapable, c'est Minfilia qui m'y aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002650_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia. Once we set forth, we are not like to return for some while. If thou wouldst choose tomes to take with thee, let it be now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002650_URIANGER<tab>Nous ne reviendrons pas avant un bon moment, Minfilia. Si tu veux emprunter un livre, c'est le moment ou jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002660_RYNE<tab>Really? May I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002660_RYNE<tab>C'est vrai<var 1D /var>? Je peux<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002670_URIANGER<tab>Of course, my dear. Yet have care thou dost not add overmuch to thy burden, lest I incur Thancred's ire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002670_URIANGER<tab>Oui, mais ne te surcharge pas inutilement non plus, sinon Thancred va rouspéter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002680_URIANGER<tab>Hast thou spoken to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> of thine encounter with the Minfilia of eld?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002680_URIANGER<tab>Avez-vous expliqué aux autres la relation qui existe entre cette jeune fille et la Minfilia que nous connaissions<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002690_THANCRED<tab>Well, I suppose now is as good a time as any.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002690_THANCRED<tab>(soupire)... Non... mais j'imagine qu'il vaut mieux leur en parler. C'est important pour la suite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002700_THANCRED<tab>As you know, I freed young Minfilia from captivity in Eulmore some three years past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002700_THANCRED<tab>Comme je vous l'ai déjà dit, Minfilia était autrefois retenue prisonnière à Eulmore. Je l'ai libérée et emmenée avec moi, il y a trois ans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002710_THANCRED<tab>Not long after, the two of us journeyed to the south of Amh Araeng. To the edge of the Empty, where the Flood was halted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002710_THANCRED<tab>Après notre fuite, nous nous sommes directement rendus au sud d'Amh Araeng, là où le déluge de Lumière a été stoppé autrefois.
