source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002720_THANCRED<tab>'Twas there that she awakened. The Minfilia of old. My Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002720_THANCRED<tab>Quand nous avons mis les pieds là-bas, la conscience de la première Min... de notre Minfilia est apparue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002730_THANCRED<tab>Tell me, tell me! What must I do to bring you back!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002730_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>! Dis-moi<var 1D /var>! Comment faire pour te sauver<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002740_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)My dearest Thancred... As I am now, I am no different from an Ascian. This child is but a vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002740_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Thancred... Je ne fais qu'emprunter le corps de jeunes filles sus<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>bles d'accueillir mon âme, comme Lahabrea l'avait fait avec toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002750_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)One of many I have used, that I might spread word of Her enduring blessing and preserve the flame of hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002750_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)J'entretiens la flamme de l'espoir dans le premier reflet en montrant aux gens la puissance de la bénédiction de la Lumière. Ni plus ni moins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002760_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)In my name, each has died never having lived her own life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002760_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Par ma faute, celles qui portent ma parole perdent déjà leur identité...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002770_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)I have taken enough from these children. I will take no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002770_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)C'est un fardeau trop cruel... Je refuse d'aller jusqu'à les dépouiller de leur libre arbitre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002780_THANCRED<tab>But what of your suffering? Your sacrifice!? This isn't fair!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002780_THANCRED<tab>Et ton propre fardeau, alors<var 1D /var>? Tu es partie te battre seule dans un autre monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002790_THANCRED<tab>I will not stand for it─I cannot! There must be something we can do. Tell me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002790_THANCRED<tab>Je ne vais pas te laisser tomber<var 1D /var>! Je t'ai déjà sauvée une fois, et je le referai sans hésiter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002800_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)Should the day come when this child grows weary of fighting, and wishes to cast it all aside...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002800_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Si les combats venaient à éroder la volonté de cette jeune fille... Si sa seule issue devenait l'abandon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002810_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)Then shall I take up her burden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002810_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Alors, je prendrais sa place, et j'affronterais son destin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002820_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)But should she wish instead to become the master of her own destiny...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002820_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)En revanche, désirerait-elle y faire face elle-même et obtenir la force pour surmonter les épreuves...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002830_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)Then shall I bequeath to her my all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002830_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Dans ce cas, je lui léguerais tous mes pouvoirs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002840_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)Imbued with the strength that I reserve for rebirth, she may come to wield my powers as her own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002840_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Je sacrifierais jusqu'à ma capacité à transférer mon âme, afin qu'elle se rapproche le plus possible de la prêtresse de la Lumière que j'étais autrefois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002850_THANCRED<tab>And what of <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> wishes!? What of F'lhaminn's!? What of all the people who love and care for you and want nothing more than to see you again!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002850_THANCRED<tab>Tu ne peux pas faire ça<var 1D /var>! F'lhaminn aussi attend toujours ton retour<var 1D /var>! Ta vie vaut plus que ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002860_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)It is not their decision to make.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002860_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Tes sentiments me touchent. Mais ce choix n'est pas le nôtre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002870_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)It is hers. This child's. This Minfilia's.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002870_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Il appartient à cette enfant, celle qu'on appelle Minfilia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002880_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)You have ever watched over me, Thancred.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002880_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Thancred... Te souviens-tu de tout ce temps que nous avons passé ensemble après l'incident avec mon père<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002890_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)Now I ask that you do the same for her. Protect her. Teach her. Stand by her as you stood by me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002890_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Ce que tu as fait pour moi, j'aimerais que tu le fasses pour elle. Protège-la, enseigne-lui ce que tu sais, et reste à ses côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002900_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)There is much and more she does not know. She needs a guide to show her the ways of the world, or she will never find her own path.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002900_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Elle est encore si jeune. Comment pourrait-elle décider de son propre sort alors qu'elle comprend à peine le monde qui l'entoure<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002910_MINFILIA<tab>(-Oracle of Light-)When the time comes, you will find me here. Until that day...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002910_MINFILIA<tab>(-Prêtresse de la Lumière-)Revenez ici lorsqu'elle aura fait son choix, et je te promets que nous nous reverrons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002920_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia, wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002920_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002930_RYNE<tab>What...what happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002930_RYNE<tab>Où... T-Thancred<var 1D /var>? Qu... Qu'est-ce qui m'est arrivé...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002940_THANCRED<tab>...And then she was gone. Minfilia─the girl─claims to have no recollection of any of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002940_THANCRED<tab>Elle avait repris ses esprits et disait ne se souvenir de rien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002950_THANCRED<tab>I've told her many things─where we came from, what we fight for. But of that day, I have not spoken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002950_THANCRED<tab>Je lui ai déjà tout raconté sur nous, sur notre Minfilia et sur le monde primitif. Mais je ne lui ai toujours pas parlé de ce qui s'est passé ce jour-là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>How do you want this to end?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quelle issue préféreriez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002960_URIANGER<tab>With the coming of another possessed of the blessing of Light, the First hath begun to rise up in defiance of its fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002960_URIANGER<tab>Minfilia a rapporté la bénédiction de la Lumière dans ce monde alors qu'il était voué à l'ané<var 16 /var>an<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002970_URIANGER<tab>The question remaineth, however... Who shall take up the flame of hope which Minfilia hath borne for so long? Whether we will it or no, the choice must soon be made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002970_URIANGER<tab>Reste à savoir qui brandira le flambeau de l'espoir, et quelles concessions cette personne fera. Quoi qu'il en soit, l'heure du choix n'a jamais été aussi proche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002980_RYNE<tab>I'm sorry I took so long. It was so hard to choose. In the end, I settled on just the one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002980_RYNE<tab>Désolée, ça m'a pris du temps. J'aimerais juste prendre celui-là, finalement, si tu veux bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002990_URIANGER<tab>That is well. Now, if all is in order, let us set forth for Lydha Lran.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_002990_URIANGER<tab>Bien sûr, prends-le. Je suis prêt à partir, moi aussi. Mettons-nous en route pour Lydha Lran.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003000_SOMEONEOFFUATHA<tab>(-Amused Fuath-)Hah hah! Well fought, well fought!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003000_SOMEONEOFFUATHA<tab>(-Fuath réjoui-)Bravo<var 1D /var>! Quel combat<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003010_SOMEONEOFFUATHB<tab>Bravo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003010_SOMEONEOFFUATHB<tab>Génial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003020_SOMEONEOFFUATHC<tab>Amazing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003020_SOMEONEOFFUATHC<tab>Im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sionnant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003030_SOMEONEOFFUATHD<tab>Jolly good show!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003030_SOMEONEOFFUATHD<tab>C'était chouette<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003040_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Ohh! You do not hold back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003040_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Ouille ouille ouille... Quelle peignée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003050_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>But I would have it no other way! Seldom have I enjoyed such sport!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003050_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>N'empêche que ce combat était vraiment sympa<var 1D /var>! Ça faisait belle lurette qu'on n'avait pas rencontré quelqu'un d'aussi amusant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003060_URIANGER<tab>We have satisfied thy demands. Wilt thou now satisfy ours?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003060_URIANGER<tab>Vous allez donc nous remettre la couronne de coquillages comme convenu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003070_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Of course! Of course...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003070_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Chose promise, chose due<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003080_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>There it is, the relic you seek! Yours for the taking. Have care you do not break it, though, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003080_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Notre inestimable trésor vous attend là-bas<var 1D /var>! Emportez-le, mais prenez garde à ne pas l'abîmer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003090_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Ah, but you, my friend... You are mighty indeed...and pleasing to the eye besides!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003090_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Dis donc, toi... T'es sacrément fortiche. C'était un vrai plaisir de te voir te battre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003100_SOMEONEOFFUATHA<tab>(-Amused Fuath-)More! I want to see more of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003100_SOMEONEOFFUATHA<tab>(-Fuath réjoui-)Perso, j'aimerais bien revoir <var 08 E905 ((l'humaine)) ((l'humain)) /var> à l'œuvre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003110_SOMEONEOFFUATHB<tab>(-Mischievous Fuath-)Yes, yes! I could watch <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> forever!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003110_SOMEONEOFFUATHB<tab>(-Fuath malicieux-)Bien d'accord. Plutôt deux fois qu'une, même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003120_SOMEONEOFFUATHC<tab>(-Enthusiastic Fuath-)Why don't we just make <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> one of us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003120_SOMEONEOFFUATHC<tab>(-Fuath excité-)On pourrait <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> garder avec nous, qu'est-ce que vous en dites<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003130_SOMEONEOFFUATHD<tab>(-Delighted Fuath-)Yesss! One of us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003130_SOMEONEOFFUATHD<tab>(-Fuath joueur-)Oh oui<var 1D /var>! Faisons ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003140_SOMEONEOFFUATHA<tab>One of us! One of us! One of us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003140_SOMEONEOFFUATHA<tab>Oh oui, oh oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003150_SOMEONEOFFUATHB<tab>One of us! One of us! One of us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003150_SOMEONEOFFUATHB<tab>Oh oui, oh oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003160_SOMEONEOFFUATHC<tab>One of us! One of us! One of us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003160_SOMEONEOFFUATHC<tab>Oh oui, oh oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003170_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>Wahaha! What a fine idea! Why ever didn't I think of that!? You may have the crown...but in exchange, we will have <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003170_BOSSOFFUATH<tab>C'est décidé à l'unanimité alors<var 1D /var>! Vous prenez la couronne, mais tu restes avec nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wake up! Wake up, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Hé<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Allez, réveille-toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Oh, you're alive! Thank the gods. I don't know where you learned to breathe underwater, but it's lucky you can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Toujours en vie, c'est déjà ça. Je ne savais pas que tu avais un truc pour respirer sous l'eau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I'm sure you had your reasons, but the first rule of dealing with the Fuath...is do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> deal with the Fuath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Les Fuath t'ont joué un sale tour. Tu t'es retrouvé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> au fond du lac en un instant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It's said that they are born from the souls of the drowned. Were it not for your little trick, you'd have joined them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>On dit que ces plaisantins naissent des âmes des noyés. Sans ton aptitude, tu ferais déjà partie de la bande.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Your friends are safely back on dry land, in case you were wondering. They'll be searching for you, I expect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ils ont déjà ramené les autres à l'air libre... Tes amis doivent être en train de se demander où tu es passé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>That's the royal capital of the Kingdom of Voeburt down there. It's seen better days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>C'est ici que s'élevait la capitale du royaume de Voeburt, à mon époque en tout cas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>They were a stubborn lot, the Voeburtites. Set in their ways. But once you got to know them, you couldn't find a more welcoming people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ses habitants étaient intraitables sur la tradition, mais aussi très chaleureux une fois qu'on avait appris à les connaître. L'hiver rigoureux des montagnes, ça a tendance à rapprocher les gens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It always froze over in winter, being up in the mountains. So we'd pull up our chairs round the fire and trade tales over steaming bowls of lamb stew, while the street lamps burned hot and bright outside...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>J'ai d'ailleurs entendu plus d'un récit d'aventures autour de leur fameux ragoût d'agneau. Je me souviens aussi des torches rougeoyantes qui illuminaient la cité<var 1D /var>; elle baignait en permanence dans leur halo...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>All dead and buried now. Them and anyone else who might remember.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Que ce soit ces lieux ou les âmes qui les peuplaient, tout ça appartient au passé désormais. Même leur souvenir s'est effacé des mémoires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Everything we did...everything we <var 1A 02 /var>gave<var 1A 01 /var>... What was it for?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>C'est à se demander... Qu'avons-nous accompli finalement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I wond─ I <var 1A 02 /var>hope<var 1A 01 /var> you'll have a better answer than this when all's said and done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Penses-tu pouvoir réussir là où nous avons échoué<var 1D /var>? Tout ce qu'on voulait, nous, c'était offrir un avenir aux gens... parvenir à les sauver du fléau...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003290_RYNE<tab>Oh, thank goodness. There you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003290_RYNE<tab>Ah ouf, vous voilà. J'ai récupéré ce que je pouvais de mon côté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003300_RYNE<tab>Those Nu Mou were rather frightening. I'm glad you're safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003300_RYNE<tab>Ces Nu Mou-là ne sont pas commodes. Je suis heureuse qu'ils ne vous aient pas blessé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm glad you're safe too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Toi aussi, tu as l'air de ne pas t'en être trop mal sortie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I see you use daggers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu te bats avec une dague dans chaque main<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You don't need to worry about me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ne t'en fais pas pour moi, va.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003310_RYNE<tab>I haven't seen much actual combat, so I was a little nervous, but I'm happy I could help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003310_RYNE<tab>Merci<var 1D /var>! Je ne me suis pas souvent battue pour de vrai, alors j'avais peur de ne pas être à la hauteur. Mais je suis contente d'avoir pu me rendre utile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003320_RYNE<tab>Thancred taught me─but I'm still a novice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003320_RYNE<tab>Oui, c'est Thancred qui m'a appris à m'en servir. Mais j'ai encore du chemin à faire pour les manier cor<var 16 /var>rec<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003330_RYNE<tab>No. Of course. How silly of me. You're a hero...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003330_RYNE<tab>Désolée<var 1D /var>! C'était mal venu de la part d'une novice comme moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003340_RYNE<tab>The Minfilias before me battled sin eaters as part of the Eulmoran Army.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003340_RYNE<tab>Les autres Minfilia ont toujours rejoint l'armée eulmorienne pour lutter contre les purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003350_RYNE<tab>But that had all changed by the time I was found. They held me captive so that I wouldn't follow in the others' footsteps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003350_RYNE<tab>Mais moi, on m'a trouvée après la fin des combats. En plus, les gens d'Eulmore ont décidé de m'enfermer pour éviter que je parte toute seule à la chasse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003360_RYNE<tab>I'd still be in my cell now had Thancred not spirited me away. When he found me, I knew nothing of the world. I didn't know how to live, let alone fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003360_RYNE<tab>C'est pour ça que quand Thancred m'a délivrée, je ne savais pas me battre, ou même me débrouiller toute seule en fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003370_RYNE<tab>Thancred once told me that if the efforts to summon you failed, it would fall to me to face the Lightwardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003370_RYNE<tab>Comme j'ai obtenu la même bénédiction que vous, Thancred disait que ce serait à moi d'exterminer les grands purgateurs, si l'exarque ne parvenait pas à vous faire venir ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003380_RYNE<tab>I realized then that it was the only reason he kept me close─as a contingency. The truth is, he can't stand to be around me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003380_RYNE<tab>C'est la seule raison pour laquelle il m'a protégée tout ce temps, je suis sûre... En fait, il doit même me maudire à chaque fois qu'il me voit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003390_RYNE<tab>Because I'm not her. I'm not his Minfilia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003390_RYNE<tab>J'y peux rien moi, si je suis pas la vraie Minfilia<var 1D /var>! Il devait l'aimer comme sa propre famille, mais elle et moi, on n'est pas la même personne...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003400_RYNE<tab>...Once, we journeyed to Nabaath Areng together. To the place where the Oracle appeared and stayed the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003400_RYNE<tab>Une fois, on est allés ensemble aux ruines de Nabaath Areng, là où la prêtresse de la Lumière a stoppé le Déluge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003410_RYNE<tab>As we drew near, I felt as though...I was fading away... I shut my eyes and covered my ears, and then... And then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003410_RYNE<tab>Plus on s'approchait de l'endroit, plus j'avais l'impression que ma conscience s'effaçait. Je crois même avoir perdu con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce à un moment, tellement j'étais terrifiée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003420_RYNE<tab>I'm not sure what happened after that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003420_RYNE<tab>Je ne sais pas trop ce qui s'est passé après ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003430_RYNE<tab>I have a vague feeling that I said something to him. Only it wasn't me at all. It was <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003430_RYNE<tab>Je crois que la vraie Minfilia et Thancred ont eu une discussion, mais c'est très flou dans ma mémoire. Un peu comme les restes d'un rêve qu'on oublie au réveil...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003440_RYNE<tab>Afterwards, Thancred didn't say a word. Only kept to himself and brooded.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003440_RYNE<tab>Il n'a rien voulu me dire, mais je sens bien qu'il s'inquiète depuis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003450_RYNE<tab>There's nothing I can do for him. Nothing I can offer but my presence─though it only reminds him of his loss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003450_RYNE<tab>En plus, dans ces moments, je ne peux rien faire pour le réconforter... Je n'apporte jamais que la misère aux gens que j'essaie d'aider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003460_RYNE<tab>She should be the one to live on. That's why I tried to find you─because I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> that was what she wanted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003460_RYNE<tab>Le mieux, ce serait que la “vraie” Minfilia prenne ma place. J'ai déjà laissé sa voix me guider, et c'est grâce à elle si j'ai su comment vous trouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003470_RYNE<tab>But now that you're here...I'm not entirely sure what it was she intended me to do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003470_RYNE<tab>En revanche, je n'arrive pas à comprendre pourquoi elle tenait tant à m'aiguiller vers vous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003480_RYNE<tab>Was I meant to tell you something? Or bring you to someone? Or some<var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var>? I can feel the answer at the edge of my mind, just out of reach─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003480_RYNE<tab>Peut-être qu'elle voulait vous transmettre un message<var 1D /var>? Non, c'est pas ça... C'était plutôt comme si... comme si elle voulait vous faire rencontrer quelqu'un de spécial.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003490_RYNE<tab>Ahhh! What...what is that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003490_RYNE<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! Que... Qu'est-ce que c'est<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003500_OLDTITANIA<tab>Why? Why did you imprison us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003500_OLDTITANIA<tab>Pourquoi... vous m'avez enfermée...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003510_OLDTITANIA<tab>Such boredom...such <var 1A 02 /var>tedium<var 1A 01 /var> have we suffered. It is unfair! <var 1A 02 /var>Unfair<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003510_OLDTITANIA<tab>Je m'ennuie... C'est pas juste... C'est pas juste...<var 1D /var>! C'est pas juste...<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003520_OLDTITANIA<tab>Come. Come and play with us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003520_OLDTITANIA<tab>Venez... Venez jouer avec moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003530_RYNE<tab>It came from the castle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003530_RYNE<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'était<var 1D /var>? Une illusion<var 1D /var>? On dirait que ça venait du château...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003540_RYNE<tab>This is everything I have. Please see it delivered to the Nu Mou.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003540_RYNE<tab>Tenez, voilà ce que j'ai réussi à récupérer. Vous devriez les apporter aux Nu Mou.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003550_RYNE<tab>I will bear word to Thancred and the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003550_RYNE<tab>Moi, je vais prévenir Thancred et les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003560_SETO<tab>Ah! My medallion! You found it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003560_SETO<tab>Oui, c'est bien elle<var 1D /var>! Je la reconnaîtrais entre mille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003570_SETO<tab>Oh, I know not how to thank you. It is my most treasured possession─a gift from a dear, departed soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003570_SETO<tab>Merci beaucoup, j'y tiens comme à la prunelle de mes yeux. C'est un cadeau d'un ami très cher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003580_SETO<tab>He was a traveler, and together we journeyed to the ends of the world and back again. When I was young.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003580_SETO<tab>C'était un grand voyageur, nous avons survolé le monde entier ensemble. J'étais si jeune que je ne pouvais même pas encore parler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003590_SETO<tab>In those days, I could not speak, but we found joy in each other's company nonetheless. Oh, the memories...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003590_SETO<tab>Mais cela ne nous a pas empêchés de vivre des aventures ex<var 16 /var>traor<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>nai<var 16 /var>res, les plus belles de toute ma vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003600_SETO<tab>This medallion he found during an adventure─fashioned it into a necklace for me, his “partner in crime.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003600_SETO<tab>Un jour, il m'a dit que l'on ne pouvait pas rêver meilleur partenaire que moi, et il m'a offert cette médaille sur un collier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003610_SETO<tab>I had not the words to tell him then, but it filled my heart with pride. I was so, so happy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003610_SETO<tab>Je n'ai pas osé lui avouer à quel point son cadeau me rendait heureux, mais je débordais de fierté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003620_SETO<tab>His name was Ardbert, and he was my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003620_SETO<tab>Il s'appelait Ardbert... Il nous a quittés depuis, mais il restera le meilleur ami que j'aie jamais eu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003630_URIANGER<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ardbert<var 1A 01 /var>, thou sayest...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003630_URIANGER<tab>Cet Arbert, c'est celui auquel je pense<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003640_SETO<tab>Everyone blamed him for the Flood. Him and his comrades.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003640_SETO<tab>Oui, l'humain que presque tous ont considéré responsable du déluge de Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003650_SETO<tab>Some few spoke up for them─of the many whose lives they had touched.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003650_SETO<tab>Mais lui et ses compagnons ont sauvé de nombreuses vies, et beaucoup les ont soutenus, à l'époque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003660_SETO<tab>But as the years went by, their voices were drowned out by those who only uttered the adventurers' names as a curse...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003660_SETO<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, ces voix partisanes se sont éteintes une à une avec le temps. On ne conte plus que l'histoire des grands pécheurs désormais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003670_SETO<tab>It was too much to bear. And so I left behind men and their lies and came to this place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003670_SETO<tab>Je ne supportais pas qu'on souille ainsi sa mémoire, alors je me suis réfugié à l'écart des humains, chez le peuple féérique.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003680_SETO<tab>Ardbert was a trusting soul, constantly being drawn into the troubles of others. Yet in spite of this, he never thought twice when he saw someone in need. He always tried to help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003680_SETO<tab>Les âmes charitables comme lui ont un don pour s'attirer les ennuis. Ça ne l'a toutefois jamais empêché de toujours porter secours aux victimes de l'infortune.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003690_SETO<tab>It was no different then. The world needed heroes─it needed him. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003690_SETO<tab>Pourquoi le destin ne s'est-il pas montré plus clément envers lui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003700_SETO<tab>He was a good man. He deserved to be happy. I wish I could have told him that, at least...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003700_SETO<tab>J'aurais tant aimé qu'il coule des jours heureux... Il était dévoué au salut de son monde et ne méritait rien d'autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm sure Ardbert knows how you feel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Où qu'il soit, je suis sûr<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> qu'il vous entend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Keep your medallion safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ne perdez pas votre médaille, cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003710_SETO<tab>You remind me of him. Your kindness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003710_SETO<tab>Merci. Vous êtes aussi attentionné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> qu'il l'était.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003720_SETO<tab>When we amaro were created, we were granted the ability to perceive souls. Thus did we recognize our masters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003720_SETO<tab>Les mages des temps anciens voulaient que nous soyons capables d'identifier facilement notre maître. Ils ont donc prodigué aux amaros l'aptitude de reconnaître une personne par son âme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003730_SETO<tab>That ability has long since faded from our kind. But due perhaps to my reversion, I can see your soul. Faintly but surely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003730_SETO<tab>Le pouvoir de mes ancêtres s'est étiolé avec le temps, mais une petite partie de lui a ressurgi en moi. Et quand je vous regarde, je crois distinguer une couleur familière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003740_SETO<tab>It is reminiscent of Ardbert's. Strikingly so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003740_SETO<tab>On dirait celle d'Ardbert... À vrai dire, je ne saurais les différencier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003750_SETO<tab>Of course, you are you, and no one else. We are defined not by the soul we are born with, but the path we walk.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003750_SETO<tab>Je sais bien que vous n'êtes pas la même personne. Quelle que soit la couleur de votre âme, ce sont les chemins que vous avez arpentés qui définissent votre identité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003760_SETO<tab>Nevertheless...I cannot help but feel that this is more than mere coincidence...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003760_SETO<tab>Je le sais bien, et pourtant, je ne peux m'empêcher d'y voir le destin à l'œuvre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003770_SETO<tab>...Which is why I will place my faith in you. The relic─it is yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003770_SETO<tab>Voilà pourquoi je crois en votre victoire. Je vais vous confier les souliers de cristal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003780_OULSIGUN<tab>There's trouble! Terrible trouble!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003780_OULSIGUN<tab>À l'aide<var 1D /var>! Il faut nous aider<var 1D /var>! On a un gros problème<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003790_THANCRED<tab>Has something happened at Lydha Lran?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003790_THANCRED<tab>Qu'est-ce qui t'arrive<var 1D /var>? Il s'est passé quelque chose à Lydha Lran<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003800_OULSIGUN<tab>Together with the twins, we were playing tricks on some nasty mortals to stop them from setting foot in Il Mheg.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003800_OULSIGUN<tab>On... On était avec les jumeaux en train de faire peur aux méchants pour pas qu'ils entrent dans Il Mheg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003810_OULSIGUN<tab>At first they ran off screaming, which was lots of fun!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003810_OULSIGUN<tab>On s'amusait bien, au départ. Ils prenaient tous leurs jambes à leur cou en criant Ahh<var 1D /var>! Hiii<var 1D /var>! Sauvez-moi<var 1D /var>! Mais ça a pas duré...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003820_OULSIGUN<tab>But then a scary, bony, <var 1A 02 /var>wrinkly<var 1A 01 /var> old mortal came along and spoiled everything! None of our tricks seem to work on him, which is no fun at all, and now they're getting closer and closer...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003820_OULSIGUN<tab>Il y a un vieux grincheux horrible qui est arrivé<var 1D /var>! Lui, il avait pas les chocottes<var 1D /var>! À cause de ça, les méchants sont presque arrivés chez nous, maintenant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003830_THANCRED<tab>Ran'jit. If he manages to find his way in, all our efforts will have been for naught.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003830_THANCRED<tab>Ran'jit<var 1D /var>! Voilà que ça se complique... Si on le laisse faire, il n'aura aucun mal à deviner ce qu'on est venus faire ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003840_URIANGER<tab>As thou sayest. Should we be discovered ere our mission here is complete, and the Lightwarden yet liveth, our task will be rendered nigh impossible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003840_URIANGER<tab>En effet. S'il apprend que nous sommes ici pour abattre le grand purgateur, la tâche n'en sera que plus ardue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003850_URIANGER<tab>If we are to prevail, we must needs divide our forces. Thus do I propose the following...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003850_URIANGER<tab>Séparons-nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003860_URIANGER<tab>Whilst thou salliest forth to meet with the Lightwarden, we shall join in the effort to obstruct the trespassers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003860_URIANGER<tab>La bénédiction de la Lumière vous aidera à terrasser notre cible. Pendant ce temps, nous rejoindrons Alphinaud pour tenter de repousser l'armée eulmorienne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003870_URIANGER<tab>Should we succeed in staying their advance, all the better. Yet even should we fail, if we can but delay our enemy's arrival long enough for thee to secure victory, our plan may still be deemed a success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003870_URIANGER<tab>Même si nous échouons, l'Il Mheg sera sauvé si vous triomphez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003880_THANCRED<tab>So the moment the lights go out, we all beat a hasty retreat, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003880_THANCRED<tab>La victoire dans la fuite... Je n'aime pas jouer le rôle de la souris, mais on n'a pas vraiment le choix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003890_RYNE<tab>Let me come with you! I have the blessing too!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003890_RYNE<tab>La bénédiction de la Lumière devrait me protéger aussi. Laissez-moi venir avec vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003900_THANCRED<tab>No, Minfilia. You'll only get underfoot. Now, come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003900_THANCRED<tab>Tu <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> gênerais plus qu'autre chose. Viens, on y va<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003910_RYNE<tab>I wish there were more I could do. Please be careful...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003910_RYNE<tab>Je suis désolée... Prenez garde à vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003920_FEOUL<tab>You have freed our fallen king. Not that I expected any less, my [adorable sapling].
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003920_FEOUL<tab>Bravo, mon <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>petit arbrisseau<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Tu as mis fin au triste sort de notre monarque déchu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003930_FEOUL<tab>The dress, the crown, the scepter, the shoes─the time has come for these relics to serve their true purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003930_FEOUL<tab>Aaah... les quatre trésors féériques... Ils vont enfin pouvoir accomplir leur but premier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003940_FEOUL<tab>For they are not only keys to the castle; they are also blessings to be bestowed upon the new king.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003940_FEOUL<tab>Ce sont à la fois les clefs qui déverrouillent l'entrée de cet endroit, mais aussi les insignes de notre royauté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003950_FEOUL<tab>The way into the castle is opened when it is time to relieve the reigning monarch of the throne. And the brave soul who does the deed has the honor of taking their place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003950_FEOUL<tab>Le château ne s'ouvre que lorsque le souverain est voué à disparaître. La brave personne qui a mis fin à son règne est alors intronisée. Telle est la magie rituelle qui gouverne ce lieu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003960_FEOUL<tab>However...should you ascend the throne, you will become one of us, never again to live as men do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003960_FEOUL<tab>Mais si tu choisis de prendre sa place, tu deviendras comme nous, et tu perdras ton humanité pour toujours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003970_FEOUL<tab>My adorable sapling. My precious mortal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003970_FEOUL<tab>Mon arbrisseau... <var 08 E905 ((Ma chère petite humaine)) ((Mon cher petit humain...)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003980_FEOUL<tab>We fae folk live forever, but such is not your virtue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003980_FEOUL<tab>Nous autres du peuple féérique vivons éter<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment, mais la beauté des tiens réside dans une existence éphémère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003990_FEOUL<tab>To strive for a dream you will never see─to sow seeds that others might one day taste the fruits of your garden─that is the beauty of your kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_003990_FEOUL<tab>Vous courez après vos rêves même s'ils sont hors de votre portée. Votre in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble volonté vous pousse à marquer le monde de votre empreinte. C'est à la fois votre plus gros défaut et votre privilège le plus précieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004000_FEOUL<tab>Burn bright and shine as only you can. These blessings, your lovely branch will accept in your stead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004000_FEOUL<tab>Je ne veux pas que mon arbrisseau perde l'étincelle qui l'anime. Alors ta jolie branchette va accepter le régalia à ta place.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004010_FEOUL<tab>[Rejoice and revel, for the Kingdom of Rainbows is forever young.]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004010_FEOUL<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Réjouissez-vous... le royaume arc-en-ciel renaît...<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004020_FEOUL<tab>Now, shall we attend to those unwise enough to trespass in our realm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004020_FEOUL<tab>Viens. Commençons par chasser de chez moi ces méchants humains qui te veulent du mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Confound it! How did they get here so fast...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne pensais pas qu'ils arriveraient jusqu'ici... Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, nous avons plus d'un tour dans notre sac<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004031_SULUIN<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004031_SULUIN<tab>Ah ah ah ah...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004032_YSIALA<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004032_YSIALA<tab>Hu fu fu fu fu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004033_OULSIGUN<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004033_OULSIGUN<tab>Gni hi hi hi hi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004040_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Damn these pixies and their tricks!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004040_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Maudites créatures...<var 1D /var>! Arrêtez de nous jouer des sales tours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004050_YSIALA<tab>(CRYING OUT IN PAIN)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004050_YSIALA<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004060_ALPHINAUD<tab>How in the seven hells!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004070_RANJIT<tab>Listen well! We come in pursuit of villains who have fled to this land.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004070_RANJIT<tab>Écoutez-moi bien, Pixies diaboliques<var 1D /var>! Nous cherchons des gens qui se sont réfugiés sur vos terres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004080_RANJIT<tab>You know who and where they are. Now, show yourselves and answer me...before I lose my patience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004080_RANJIT<tab>Vous ne pouvez pas ignorer où ils se trouvent. Alors montrez-vous et coopérez<var 1D /var>! Sinon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004090_YSIALA<tab>Owww! Stop! It hurts, it hurts!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004090_YSIALA<tab>Non... Stop<var 1D /var>! Je... J'ai mal...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004100_YSIALA<tab>(CRYING OUT IN PAIN)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004100_YSIALA<tab>Ah... Argh...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Enough! Lift the enchantment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il nous a damé le pion... Défais ton charme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004120_RANJIT<tab>Minfilia. Willful child. How many times must I come to collect you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004120_RANJIT<tab>Vilaine fille... Combien de fois comptes-tu te laisser ravir par ces sales rats<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004130_RYNE<tab>I won't return to Eulmore! And I won't let you hurt my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004130_RYNE<tab>Je ne retournerai pas à Eulmore<var 1D /var>! Et je ne vous laisserai pas vous mettre en travers de notre route non plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004140_RANJIT<tab>What is this stance? Where did you learn it!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004140_RANJIT<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça<var 1D /var>? Qui t'a enseigné cette posture ridicule<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004150_RANJIT<tab>No Oracle I trained would make such an unseemly show of herself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004150_RANJIT<tab>Aucune des prêtresses qui étaient autrefois sous mon aile n'aurait osé afficher autant de disgrâce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004160_RANJIT<tab>Know your shame, girl! You are powerless! You have no life nor purpose save that which our master sees fit to permit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004160_RANJIT<tab>Tu devrais avoir honte<var 1D /var>! Et réaliser ton impuissance<var 1D /var>! Ta place est aux côtés de notre maître<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004161_ALISAIE<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004161_ALISAIE<tab>(porte un coup d'estoc rapide)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004170_THANCRED<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004170_THANCRED<tab>(Frappe d'une taillade verticale à l'épée)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004180_RANJIT<tab>(BLOCKING GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004180_RANJIT<tab>(contre un coup d'épée de justesse)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004190_THANCRED<tab>Who are you to dictate her purpose? To lock her away and deny her a life!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004190_THANCRED<tab>Bande d'abrutis, elle ne comprenait même pas le sens profond de son nom quand vous l'avez enfermée. C'est vous qui l'avez rendue impuissante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004200_THANCRED<tab>If she was powerless, it's because of you, you sanctimonious swine. But no longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004200_THANCRED<tab>Mais aujourd'hui, elle s'insurge et prend les armes<var 1D /var>! Alors tes discours sur la honte et la disgrâce, tu peux te les garder, vieux débris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004210_RANJIT<tab>Fool. Defiance only begets more suffering. It is through acceptance alone that one may find solace in this godsforsaken world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004210_RANJIT<tab>Des rats qui passent leur temps à fuir ne peuvent pas comprendre... L'enfer de la guerre... La stérilité du conflit... Seule une société stable et en paix peut nous apporter le bonheur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004220_ALISAIE<tab>Look─the sky!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004220_ALISAIE<tab>Regardez<var 1D /var>! Le ciel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004230_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s done it! The Warrior of Darkness has triumphed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004230_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> a réussi<var 1D /var>! <var 08 E905 ((La Guerrière)) ((Le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres a vaincu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004240_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>General? What are our orders? What do we do!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004240_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Mais...<var 1D /var>! Mais c'est...<var 1D /var>! Que fait-on, Général<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004250_RANJIT<tab>We do what we came to do. Subdue this rabble, and find the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004250_RANJIT<tab>C'est pourtant évident. Nous passons sur le corps de ces imbéciles s'il le faut, mais nous poursuivons <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004260_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Forward, men! Take the villains captive!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004260_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>En... En avant, toute<var 1D /var>! Capturez tous les rebelles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004270_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Are you deaf!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004270_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Vous ne m'avez pas entendu<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004280_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>I said─!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004280_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>À... l'atta...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004281_SULUIN<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004281_SULUIN<tab>Haaa ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004282_YSIALA<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004282_YSIALA<tab>Kya ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004283_OULSIGUN<tab>(LAUGHTER)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004283_OULSIGUN<tab>Hiiii hi hi hi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004290_SULUIN<tab>[The king is returned!]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004290_SULUIN<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Notre reine est de retour<var 1D /var>!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004300_YSIALA<tab>[Make ready the feast!]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004300_YSIALA<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>On va faire la fête<var 1D /var>!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004310_OULSIGUN<tab>[Make ready the feast!]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004310_OULSIGUN<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>On va faire la fête<var 1D /var>!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004320_EULMORESOLDIERC<tab>What's...what's happening!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004320_EULMORESOLDIERC<tab>Qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004330_EULMORESOLDIERC<tab>Water? That wasn't there before...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004330_EULMORESOLDIERC<tab>Une flaque d'eau<var 1D /var>? Y en avait pas tout à l'heure...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004340_EULMORESOLDIERC<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004340_EULMORESOLDIERC<tab>(cris d'effroi)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004341_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004341_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>(cris d'effroi)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004342_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004342_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>(cri d'effroi)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004350_SOMEONEOFNUMOUA<tab>[The night is delightful. Dance we shall!]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004350_SOMEONEOFNUMOUA<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Par cette nuit de joie, nous dansons<var 1D /var>!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004360_SOMEONEOFNUMOUB<tab>[The night is delightful. Sing we shall!]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004360_SOMEONEOFNUMOUB<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Par cette nuit de joie, nous chantons<var 1D /var>!<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004370_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004370_EULMORESOLDIERA<tab>(cri d'effroi)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004380_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>Help meeeeee!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004380_EULMORESOLDIERB<tab>À l'aiiiide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004390_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>What's the matter with you!? Get a hold of yourselves, damn it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004390_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Mais qu'est-ce que vous faites...<var 1D /var>!? Reprenez-vous, bon sang<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004400_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>General, they come in greater numbers! We must retreat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004400_EULMOREADJUTANT<tab>Mon Général, d'autres arrivent sur nous<var 1D /var>! Nous devons battre en retraite<var 1D /var>! Donnez l'ordre, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004410_RANJIT<tab>All who stand with the Warrior of Darkness shall face justice! My master demands it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004410_RANJIT<tab>Vous êtes tous les complices <var 08 E905 ((de la Guerrière)) ((du Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres, c'est évident... Soyez certains que mon maître rétablira l'ordre, et que vous paierez pour vos crimes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004420_ALISAIE<tab>I see... Well, it's a good thing Feo Ul volunteered to become king in your stead─for all our sakes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Hmmm... Et voilà comment les Pixies se retrouvent avec un nouveau monarque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004430_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are grateful for your timely aid, Feo Ul─or should I say, Your Majesty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci de nous avoir apporté la protection du peuple féérique, Feo Ul. Enfin, je devrais peut-être dire Titania, maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004440_FEOUL<tab>'Twas the first night in recent memory. We all of us but wished to make the most of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004440_FEOUL<tab>Tout le monde a voulu s'inviter à la fête. Ça faisait si longtemps que nous n'avions pas profité d'une belle nuit enténébrée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004450_FEOUL<tab>That's something you must remember about us fae folk. Though our existence may be eternal, we exist only for the present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004450_FEOUL<tab>Mais vous devez comprendre une chose. Nous sommes comme l'écume qui jaillit où la mer rencontre la terre, nous sommes le bouillonnement éternel entre la vie et la mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004460_FEOUL<tab>We live in the here and now, paying no mind to futures that may or may not be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004460_FEOUL<tab>Nous ne vivons que pour nous amuser, sans nous soucier du lendemain ou de quand tout cela prendra fin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004470_FEOUL<tab>To wit, we are not driven as men are. We cannot fight for such causes as men do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004470_FEOUL<tab>C'est pourquoi nous ne pourrons jamais partager cette volonté très humaine de se battre pour bâtir l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004480_RYNE<tab>Does that mean you won't aid us against the sin eaters?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004480_RYNE<tab>Tu... Vous voulez dire que... vous ne nous aiderez pas contre les purgateurs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004490_FEOUL<tab>Not unless the mood takes us. But if it was to repay a debt? Well then, that's another matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004490_FEOUL<tab>Eh bien, disons qu'il nous faudrait une bonne raison<var 1D /var>! Comme... une dette à honorer, par exemple<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004500_FEOUL<tab>To take back as much as is taken. To create as much as is destroyed. To give as much as is received. Such is the way of Il Mheg.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004500_FEOUL<tab>À tout vol un don, et à toute perte un gain. Nous offrons autant que nous recevons. Telle est la règle de l'immuable royaume arc-en-ciel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004510_FEOUL<tab>By this law, we shall lend you our strength─in return for the beautiful sky you have restored to us. In times of need, do not hesitate to call.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004510_FEOUL<tab>Ce ciel est un magnifique cadeau, et nous vous revaudrons la pareille. Alors pensez à nous quand vous vous sentirez au pied du mur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll be sad to lose you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ce ne sera pas vraiment pareil sans toi, Feo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What about our pact?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est la fin de notre pacte<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004520_FEOUL<tab>Silly sapling, I shall remain at your side!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004520_FEOUL<tab>Ohh<var 1D /var>! Mais je ne t'abandonne pas, mon petit arbrisseau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004530_FEOUL<tab>Even should my body be in the castle, 'tis a simple thing to have a little part of me accompany you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004530_FEOUL<tab>Même en restant dans ce château, je pourrai envoyer une petite copie de moi pour voler à ton secours en cas de besoin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004540_FEOUL<tab>Treat them as you would your [beautiful branch].
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004540_FEOUL<tab>Feo Ul restera ta <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>jolie branchette<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, alors sois aux petits soins avec elle, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>All seems well at the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Voilà qui me rassure. Cristarium ne semble pas avoir subi de dégâts en notre absence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004560_ALISAIE<tab>Yes. Eulmore was plainly more concerned with finding us. How flattering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004560_ALISAIE<tab>L'armée eulmorienne devait être trop occupée à nous traquer. On va pouvoir souffler un moment, même s'il faudra rester sur nos gardes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004570_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)You certainly took your time. I had half-resolved to complete the task myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004570_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Enfin rentrés<var 1D /var>? Et moi qui croyais que les héros ne lambinaient pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004580_ALISAIE<tab>And you are?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004580_ALISAIE<tab>Et on peut savoir qui parle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004590_URIANGER<tab>Were one to study the annals of Garlean history, one would find yonder visage on many a page.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004590_URIANGER<tab>Ce visage me rappelle quelqu'un... On peut trouver le portrait de cet homme dans les livres d'histoire de Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004600_URIANGER<tab>Though by rights its youth should long since have faded.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004600_URIANGER<tab>En revanche, je suis surpris qu'il ait encore l'air si jeune, après toutes ces années...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004610_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Well, well, we have a historian in our midst. That spares me a lengthy explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004610_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Ah<var 1D /var>! Quelqu'un d'instruit. Permets-moi de t'éviter de fastidieuses in<var 16 /var>tro<var 16 /var>duc<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004620_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Solus zos Galvus-)I am Solus zos Galvus, founding father of the Garlean Empire. And, under various guises, the architect of myriad other imperially inclined nations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004620_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Solus zos Galvus-)Mon nom est Solus, empereur fondateur de Garlemald et instigateur de conflits à mes heures perdues.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004630_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Solus zos Galvus-)As for my true identity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004630_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Solus zos Galvus-)Toutefois, vous me connaissez aussi sous un autre nom...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004640_EMETSELCH<tab>I am Emet-Selch. Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004640_EMETSELCH<tab>Emet-Selch. Ravi de faire votre con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004650_ALISAIE<tab>Gaius spoke of you! A native of the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004650_ALISAIE<tab>Emet-Selch<var 1D /var>! Gaius nous en avait parlé<var 1D /var>! C'est un Ascien originel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004660_THANCRED<tab>Equal in rank to Lahabrea. And you came all this way just to introduce yourself to us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004660_THANCRED<tab>Un des acolytes de Lahabrea, hein<var 1D /var>? Si c'est le cas, il n'est pas venu là pour discuter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004670_EMETSELCH<tab>Behold the sky, restored to its former glory! Have you ever seen a more affecting spectacle?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004670_EMETSELCH<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>! Regardez-moi ce ciel<var 1D /var>! Magnifique<var 1D /var>! On ne pourrait pas rêver mieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004680_EMETSELCH<tab>Ohhh, it is truly, deeply...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004680_EMETSELCH<tab>Quand je vois ça, je me sens... Comment dire<var 1D /var>? Je me sens...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004690_EMETSELCH<tab>...Infuriating. Do you have any idea how much you have delayed the Rejoining?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004690_EMETSELCH<tab>Terriblement désappointé, c'est ça, oui... Savez-vous depuis combien de temps je m'échine à fusionner ce monde avec le vôtre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004700_EMETSELCH<tab>Following the Flood, the First had been listing ever further towards the Light─towards stasis. The end was in sight!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004700_EMETSELCH<tab>Au départ, je me disais que le déluge de Lumière avait fait son œuvre, que le monde s'enfoncerait peu à peu dans la stagnation... que j'avais réussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004710_EMETSELCH<tab>Enter man and his indomitable spirit. <var 1A 02 /var>He<var 1A 01 /var> would haul the world back from the brink!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004710_EMETSELCH<tab>Mais non<var 1D /var>! Il a fallu qu'une poignée de ces piteux humains essaient de se relever après le désastre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004720_EMETSELCH<tab>And adding his lumpen weight to the power of growth, he duly tipped the scales, if only by a fraction. Yet a fraction was enough to spoil the perfect imbalance needed to bring about a Rejoining!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004720_EMETSELCH<tab>Leur refus d'accepter leur sort a pesé du côté du changement et empêché la balance de basculer com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004730_EMETSELCH<tab>Had mankind continued to live in idleness under Vauthry's rule, all the conditions would have been met...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004730_EMETSELCH<tab>C'est là que Vauthry devait se montrer utile. Il devait rassembler ces derniers entêtés sous sa coupe et les rendre indolents. J'étais certain que le temps aidant, les conditions d'une réunification seraient rassemblées...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004740_EMETSELCH<tab>But <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> had to come and ruin it all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004740_EMETSELCH<tab>Puis tu es venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> mettre ton grain de sel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004741_EMETSELCH<tab>Thanks to your meddling, Light's supremacy is in doubt, and our painstakingly laid plans are in tatters!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004741_EMETSELCH<tab>Tu t'es mis<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à abattre les grands purgateurs et la con<var 16 /var>cen<var 16 /var>tra<var 16 /var>tion de Lumière n'a fait que baisser depuis<var 1D /var>! À cause de toi, mes projets ont volé en éclats<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004750_THANCRED<tab>Well, I should begin by thanking you for confirming Urianger's theories on the inner workings of the Calamity. He will be most pleased.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004750_THANCRED<tab>Alors Urianger avait vu juste au sujet du fonc<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment des fléaux. Merci pour l'info.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004760_THANCRED<tab>As for what happens next, might I suggest you admit defeat and walk away?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004760_THANCRED<tab>Par contre, maintenant qu'on a mis à mal ton plan si bien huilé, ça nous arrangerait si tu pouvais lâcher l'affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004770_EMETSELCH<tab>Happy to let me go, are you? Because the murderous glint in your eye suggests otherwise. Indeed, it is enough to make me think better of confronting you alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004770_EMETSELCH<tab>Hmpf... Et pourtant, tout chez toi indique que tu as l'air prêt à en découdre. Voilà pourquoi j'évite de traiter avec vous autres en général.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004780_EMETSELCH<tab>Look, it did cross my mind to simply side with Vauthry and kill you all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004780_EMETSELCH<tab>J'ai bien réfléchi à faire de Vauthry un allié et à me servir de lui pour vous éliminer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004790_EMETSELCH<tab>But that's no different from what Lahabrea did. And we all know how well that ended for him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004790_EMETSELCH<tab>Mais ça, c'est la méthode Lahabrea, si je puis dire. Vous comme moi savons qu'elle n'est pas très efficace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004800_EMETSELCH<tab>And so, while it is liable to be troublesome, I have settled upon a different approach...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004800_EMETSELCH<tab>J'ai eu beaucoup de mal à me faire à l'idée, mais j'ai imaginé une meilleure solution.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004810_EMETSELCH<tab>Cooperation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004810_EMETSELCH<tab>Collaborons, pour changer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004820_EMETSELCH<tab>I will not raise a hand to hinder your hunt for the Lightwardens. If you desire it, I will even lend you my knowledge and strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004820_EMETSELCH<tab>Vous pouvez abattre les grands purgateurs, je ne vous retiendrai pas. Mieux, je vous offrirai mon aide si nécessaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Since time immemorial, you and yours have labored to rejoin the thirteen shards, at the cost of countless lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous voulez rire<var 1D /var>!? Vous avez déjà provoqué plusieurs fléaux pour assouvir vos desseins de réunification<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do you expect us to believe that your objective has suddenly changed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004840_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est d'ailleurs la raison pour laquelle vous êtes ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004850_EMETSELCH<tab>Nay, our objective is the same as it ever was─though I daresay you do not know our motive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004850_EMETSELCH<tab>Notre objectif reste inchangé, évidemment. Mais pouvez-vous prétendre connaître nos motivations<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004860_EMETSELCH<tab>A war waged without knowledge of the enemy is no war─it is mere bloodletting. Just once...might we not seek to find common ground?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004860_EMETSELCH<tab>Au lieu de nous battre sans rien savoir les uns des autres, nous pourrions commencer par discuter calmement, qu'en dites-vous<var 1D /var>? Après tout, nous ne sommes pas des barbares.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004870_EMETSELCH<tab>For good or ill, I am immortal. Provided I have the inclination, I can always begin anew. Scheme and conspire to my heart's content.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004870_EMETSELCH<tab>Ne vous en déplaise, je suis immortel. Peu importe si j'échoue dix fois, cent fois, rien ne m'empêchera d'ébaucher de nouveaux projets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004880_EMETSELCH<tab>But this time, I thought that I might instead try to see eye to eye. To understand what drives the hero of the Source. To determine if our goals are truly incompatible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004880_EMETSELCH<tab>Mais pour une fois, j'ai pensé qu'il serait bon de comprendre ce qui anime les défenseurs de ce monde, ce qu'ils cherchent à accomplir. Nos points de vue sont-ils si incompatibles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004890_EMETSELCH<tab>So come. Shed your preconceptions. See beyond the unscrupulous villains you take us for.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004890_EMETSELCH<tab>J'espère que vous pourrez en faire de même et porter un regard nouveau sur nous. Après tout, vous nous vouez une haine farouche, mais sans vraiment savoir pourquoi, si je ne m'abuse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004900_EMETSELCH<tab>When all is said and done, we may find ourselves pleasantly surprised. The proud discoverers of a path of cooperation rather than opposition. Think of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004900_EMETSELCH<tab>Qui sait<var 1D /var>? Peut-être y a-t-il un futur dans lequel nous coexistons...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004910_URIANGER<tab>Thou hast delivered thy proposal, and we would not dismiss it outright.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004910_URIANGER<tab>Vos arguments sont plutôt convaincants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004920_URIANGER<tab>If I may offer thee counsel, however: to make thy case via an illusion reflecteth poorly upon thy sincerity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004920_URIANGER<tab>Mais comment vous faire confiance, alors que vous usez de subterfuges pour proposer une entente<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004930_EMETSELCH<tab>My apologies. You will forgive me if I am not entirely at ease in the presence of a famed Ascian-slayer. I felt it only prudent to take precautions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004930_EMETSELCH<tab>Pardonnez-moi ce faux pas. J'ai préféré prendre mes précautions face à ceux qui ont déjà éliminé l'un des nôtres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004940_EMETSELCH<tab>Nonetheless, your counsel is duly noted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004940_EMETSELCH<tab>J'essaierai de faire plus attention à mes manières la prochaine fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004950_EMETSELCH<tab>I take my leave, friends. Rest assured, we shall meet again soon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004950_EMETSELCH<tab>Sur ce, chers amis, je vous dis à très bientôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004960_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>(-Handwritten Missive-)"I hope the past few days have not been overly taxing. Pray take your rest and recover.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004960_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>(-Note laissée sur la table-)Désolé d'avoir prolongé ta mission de sauvetage. Prends soin de toi, et reprends des forces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004970_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>From the Exarch, is it? With that mirror of his, he can watch your every move, you know. He'll probably think you're talking to yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004970_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ça vient de l'exarque. Il doit observer tous tes faits et gestes grâce à son espèce de miroir magique.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004980_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Still, he's keeping you well fed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004980_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Il sait aussi se montrer chaleureux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004990_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Judging by his people's faith in him, he seems to be a decent sort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_004990_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ce doit être un type bien, vu la confiance que lui accordent les gens d'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005000_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But so much about him remains shrouded in mystery. Like what was he doing back in my day? There was no such person when I was around.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005000_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Par contre, il est trop mystérieux à mon goût. Je n'ai jamais entendu parler de quelqu'un comme lui de mon vivant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005010_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>A lot's happened since the Flood, though. Since I was...set adrift. I know little more than you do of this city's history and the Exarch's past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005010_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>J'ai erré trop longtemps après le déluge de Lumière pour me rappeler quoi que ce soit de la suite... Au final, je n'en sais pas plus que toi sur cette cité ou sur l'exarque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005020_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Not that it matters. It's Emet-Selch we should be concerned about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005020_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Cela dit, celui dont on doit vraiment se méfier, c'est Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005030_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When our world was about to be consumed by Light, the Ascian in white appeared before us. He said that the only way for us to live on was to bring about the Rejoining.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005030_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Il me rappelle cet Ascien en robe blanche, qui était venu nous trouver alors que nous étions au bord de l'annihilation... C'est lui qui nous avait persuadés que réunifier nos deux mondes nous permettrait de ne pas tomber entièrement dans l'oubli.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005040_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Desperate as we were, we heeded his words, not realizing that the Flood was of the Ascians' own making.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005040_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nous avons saisi cette main tendue en désespoir de cause... et sans même réaliser que déclencher un déluge de Lumière faisait partie de son plan depuis le début.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005050_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>They cannot be trusted. None of them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005050_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nous aurions dû nous en rendre compte plus tôt, évidemment. Mais nous étions trop naïfs. La morale de cette histoire, c'est qu'on ne peut pas faire confiance à un Ascien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005060_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But Emet-Selch had one thing right: one should not fight blindly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005060_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Et pourtant... je pense quand même qu'Emet-Selch a raison. Personne ne devrait se battre sans connaître la situation et les motivations de son adversaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>That's what we did. And it cost us everything we held dear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005070_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je sais de quoi je parle... C'est parce que j'ai foncé tête baissée que j'en suis là et qu'il ne me reste plus rien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not everything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il te reste au moins un ami.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tell me about Seto.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Parle-moi un peu de Seto.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're putting me off my dinner.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Et moi qui voulais faire un somme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...You mean Seto? Well, that's... Aye. I suppose you're right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005080_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tu veux parler de Seto<var 1D /var>? Hmpf... C'est vrai, t'as peut-être raison.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>He's done some growing. When we were traveling together, he was nowhere near as big.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005090_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>J'ai été surpris en le voyant. Il a pas mal grandi depuis l'époque où nous voyagions ensemble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And he obviously couldn't speak. I had no idea how much that medallion meant to him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005100_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>J'arrive pas à croire qu'il tienne encore autant à cette médaille. Et il a hérité du pouvoir de ses ancêtres<var 1D /var>? Ça alors...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005110_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What about you, anyway? You must have a friend like Seto. Chocobo, perhaps? Come on, you tell me something for a change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005110_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Bah quoi... T'as bien un chocobo, toi<var 1D /var>! Tu lui as donné un nom, j'parie. Comment il s'appelle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>What? What about Seto? What is there to say...? All right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005120_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Seto<var 1D /var>!? Pourquoi tu veux que je te parle de lui<var 1D /var>? Enfin, c'est pas comme si ça me dérangeait, mais bon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Oh, poor you! ...But I take your point.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah, désolé. C'est vrai que tu es censé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> reprendre des forces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Let's see, then...what's a good topic for mealtime...? Food, I suppose? I could tell you all about Voeburtite cuisine, if you like.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Je pourrais en profiter pour te parler des bons petits plats d'ici. Hmm... Ou t'en dire plus sur la gastronomie de Voeburt. Ils savent faire bien plus que des ragoûts, tu sais<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Oh, and there's the time we were forced to collect rare ingredients for some godsforsaken feast. If it sounds ridiculous, it's because it was.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! En parlant de ça, faudra que je te raconte la fois où on a dû réunir les trois Merveilles de Norvrandt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...What? You too? Haha! Parallel worlds, eh? So what sort of things did you have to fetch, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05001_005160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Éorzéa aussi a ses trois Merveilles culinaires<var 1D /var>? Vous avez dû vous régaler<var 1D /var>! C'étaient quel genre de plats<var 1D /var>?
